loans.name: Maura Cristina

texts.en:
Maura Cristina lives with her family in a house that, together with her husband, she has been able to build. Much needs to be done so that it covers all the family needs. However, Maura sees this credit and relation with Kiva as a unique opportunity to advance in the completion of the house. She is determined to be a good payer so that she can access a new credit as soon as this one is paid off.

Maura wants to use this credit to finish covering the water and electricity installations that are still exposed around the house. She feels unsafe with tubes and wires, especially when her son Oscar (shown in picture) is running around. She will receive technical supervision from certified technicians to ensure the work is done correctly. Maura says that with this credit she will be able to make some work that otherwise would take her almost two years to complete, and for that she is thankful.

loans.use: to provide a safer environment for her family

loans.name: Heydi Veronica

texts.es:
ha logrado salir adelante haciendo lo que le gusta, que es ser estilista, ella tiene su propio salón de belleza en uno de los centros de compras más importantes de su ciudad. Poco a poco ha logrado hacer crecer su negocio. 
En estos momentos ha solicitado ayuda de Kiva y MiCrédito para que se le otorgue un préstamo que le permita abastecerse y comprar shampoo, acondicionadores, tratamientos capilares, variedad de maquillaje, estuches de pinturas de uñas entre otras cosas, que demandan sus clientela. En un futuro desea poder tener un salón de belleza más grande, además de poner una tienda de ropa.
texts.en:
Heydi Veronica has managed to get ahead doing what she likes, which is being a hair stylist. She has her own beauty salon in one of the more prominent shopping centers of her city. Little by little she has succeeded in making her business grow.

At this time she has applied for help from Kiva and MiCredito so that she can be granted a loan that will allow her to stock up and buy shampoo, conditioners, hair treatments, a variety of make-up, and nail polish kits, among other items that her customers request. 

In the future, she wants to be able to have a larger beauty salon, in addition to setting up a clothing store.

loans.use: to buy shampoo, conditioners, hair treatments, a variety of make-up, and nail polish kits, among other items.

loans.name: Maria Edith

texts.es:
María, tiene la dicha de compartir su vida con su pareja y sus hijas, ella ayuda a su compañero de vida con los gastos familiares, genera ingresos mediante sus servicios de sastre, oficio que realiza desde hace 8 años, tiene muchos clientes y además cuenta con un contrato para elaborar uniformes de escuelas públicas, su horario de trabajo es de ocho de la mañana a tres de la tarde, el oficio se lo inculcaron sus parientes y posteriormente tomo clases,  su desventaja es que no cuenta con personal que le apoye en sus actividades.
Con el capital piensa comprar repuestos para la máquina de coser y accesorios para la costura como: telas, botones, zippers, etc., le permitirá tener  un equipo de trabajo en óptimas condiciones y prepararse para la temporada de elaboración de uniformes, espera lograr tener mejores ingresos y sus riesgos son la violencia que afecta la comunidad.
Su visión es brindar a sus hijos apoyo para finalizar una carrera universitaria, ampliar su negocio y generar empleo a otras personas para que también puedan superarse.
texts.en:
Maria has the good fortune to share her life with her partner and her daughters. She helps her life partner with the family expenses. She generates income by providing her services as a seamstress, work she's been doing for 8 years. She has many clients and also has a contract to make uniforms for public schools. She works from 8AM to 3PM. Her family started her in the business and she also took classes. Her disadvantage is that she has no one to support her in her activities.
With the loan she plans to buy spare parts for her sowing machine and sowing accessories like fabrics, buttons, and zippers. This will allow her to have work equipment in optimal conditions and prepare herself for the season of making school uniforms. She hopes to generate a better income. Her biggest risks is the violence that affects her community.
Her vision is to support her children so that can obtain an university education, expand her business, and generate jobs for other people so that they can also get ahead.

loans.use: buy spare parts for her sowing machine and accessories like fabrics, buttons, and zippers which will allow her to have work equipment in optimal conditions.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy jewelry made of silver, bronze, and other materials, to present a more varied inventory to her clients.

loans.name: Georgette

texts.fr: Georgette est une femme mariée âgée de 36 ans qui vit à Tokoin. Mère de quatre enfants,  prépare, frit de la viande du porc et le revend dans l’enceinte de son domicile. Georgette s’approvisionne du nécessaire deux fois par mois  au marché et désire ce prêt pour commander des porcs.  Avec la marge bénéficiaire qui en résultera, Georgette compte améliorer sa prestation de vente et aider son mari dans les charges de la famille et bien s’occuper de leurs enfants.
texts.en: Georgette is a 36 year old married woman who lives in Tokoin. Mother of four children, she prepares fried pork meat and re-sells it in the enclosure of her household. Georgette gets her necessary supplies twice a month at the market and wants this loan for ordering pork. With the profit margin that will result, Georgette intends to improve her sales performance and to help her husband with family responsibilities and to take care of their children well.

loans.use: to buy 8 units of pork.

loans.name: Nightingle

texts.en:
Nightingle is 64 years old, married and is from Lao Proper, Plaridel in Misamis Occidental Province. She is a pensioner and member of Kiva's field partner Paglaum MPC who has availed herself of various loans from the cooperative.

Recently, Nightingle applied for a 10,000 PHP loan to buy essential medications and vitamins. She is grateful to the cooperative for the support extended to her whether it is for personal reasons or not.

loans.use: to buy essential medications and vitamins.

loans.name: Christopher

texts.en:
Christopher started his business 2 years ago due to family medical needs that demanded a flexible schedule. He and his wife currently run his business and are both passionate about sales and quality customer service. When thinking of starting a business they both agreed that entering the insurance industry would be a great way to practice customer service skills while also filling a need. 

Christopher is originally from Florida. He and his wife currently live at home with both of their children. Their greatest success as business owners has been the ability to generate approximately one million dollar in sales during their first open enrollment period. 

Their largest difficulty however has been in making the transition from being a two person operated business to growing their company and  hiring employees. Christopher and his wife are currently seeking a loan to secure six months of sale leads. The growth in revenue will allow Christopher and his wife transition into hiring additional employees to help meet demands of their clients. To learn more and Christopher’s business, please visit  www.harveyinsurancegroupinc.com

loans.use: To secure six months of sale leads

loans.name: Carmen

texts.en:
Carmen is 58 years old, married and lives in Cartagena Proper, Plaridel in Misamis Occidental Province. She operates a sari-sari, or convenience store, and consistently makes a good profit.

Recently, Carmen applied for her eighth loan through Kiva's field partner Paglaum MPC, this one for 7000 PHP to restock her store with basic commodities such as rice, canned goods, noodles, condiments and confectioneries. She is grateful for the financial assistance extended by PMPC to small-time borrower-entrepreneurs such as she.

loans.use: to restock her store with basic commodities.

location.town: Plaridel - Cartagena Proper, Plaridel, Misamis Occ

loans.name: Mounossimba

texts.fr: Mounossimba est une femme mariée dynamique qui vit à Tokoin  avec ses trois enfants  et son mari. Mounossimba est âgée de 41 ans et s’active parfaitement  pour avoir une bonne situation financière. Mounossimba est une revendeuse des chaussures et des articles de mercerie qui s’approvisionne une fois par mois au marché. Pour atteindre ses objectifs, Mounossimba nécessite ce prêt pour commander des rouleaux de kaki et des douzaines de chaussures afin de répondre favorablement aux attentes de ses clients et avoir une autonomie financière remarquable  pour aider ses enfants dans leur éducation scolaire.
texts.en: Mounossimba is an energetic, married woman who lives in Tokoin with her three children and her husband. Mounossimba is 41 years old and keeps herself perfectly busy to be in a good financial situation. Mounossimba is a re-seller of shoes and haberdashery products, who gets her supplies once a month at the market. In order to reach her goals, Mounossimba needs this loan to order rolls of khaki and dozens of shoes in order to respond favourably to her client's expectations and to have significant financial independence to help her children in their school education.

loans.use: to buy 2 rolls of khaki and 3 dozens of shoes.

loans.name: Segundino

texts.en:
Segundino, 48, is married with school-aged children from Southern Poblacion, Plaridel in Misamis Occidental Province. He is a fisherman and has a hard time making his income stretch to meet the needs of his family.

Once, Segundino decided to pawn a parcel of his land to pay for his children’s hospital bills. He learned about Kiva's field partner Paglaum MPC and signed up for membership. He was grateful he could avail himself of its financial products for cases of special need. He is applying here for a 10,000 PHP loan to redeem his pawned land.

loans.use: to redeem his pawned land.

loans.name: Julieta

texts.en: Julieta sells nipa (thatch) wholesale and delivers it into Zamboanga del Norte areas. She's doing well in her business ventures and making good sales. She has mastered this type of business. Recently, she requested a loan to purchase nipa for wholesale.

loans.use: to purchase nipa to sell.

loans.name: Corazon

texts.en: Corazon is a member of Paglaum MPC for eight years. She is a hog raiser who is making good profits from this venture. Currently, she requests a loan to buy additional piglets and bags of animal feed.

loans.use: to buy additional piglets and bags of animal feed.

location.town: Plaridel - Dampalan, Lopez Jaena, Misamis Occident

loans.name: Leona

texts.en:
Leona is a businesswoman from Looc Proper, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental. She is 62 years old and married, with expertise in selling. She runs a sari-sari store and earns a monthly income of PHP 10,000. This sufficiently supports her family.

Leona is a full-fledged member of PMPC and has already taken several loans. She maintains her membership in good standing without records of default. Now, she applied for a loan to restock her store with basic commodities and other consumable items. Leona continues to look for better business opportunities, proof that she has the passion and the energy to make ends meet for her family.

loans.use: to restock store with basic commodities and other consumable items.

loans.name: Bebilita

texts.en: Bebilita is a pensioner member of Paglaum MPC for 10 years. She had enjoyed all the benefits of membership including insurance services. Recently, she requested a loan of PHP 10,000 to purchase maintenance medicines and vitamins.

loans.use: to purchase medicine and vitamins.

loans.name: Estela

texts.es:
Estela es una joven mujer de treinta y siete años de edad, dedicada a su pulpería desde hace diecinueve años, su esposo le brinda soporte y la alienta a que siga creciendo como comerciante. 
En estos momentos, necesita de un préstamo de kiva junto a MiCrédito, con el cual planea invertir en la compra de granos básicos, jabones, detergentes, comida enlata, refrescos embotellados, entre otros productos, que en esta temporada del año son muy solicitados. En un futuro planea hacer de su negocio una distribuidora importante.
texts.en:
Estela is a young woman who is 37 years old. Her occupations has been the grocery store for the last 19 years. Her husband brings her support and encourages her to keep growing as a shopkeeper. 
At this moment, she needs a loan from Kiva together with MiCredito, with which she plans to invest in the purchase of staple grains, detergents, canned food, bottled sodas, among other products, which are in great demand at this time of year. 
In the future she plans to make her business into an important distribution center.

loans.use: to buy staple grains, detergents, canned food, bottled sodas, among other products.

loans.name: Isidra

texts.en:
Isidra is an active member of Paglaum MPC who enjoys all the perks of membership. She is 77 years old and married with adult-aged children. She said she's secured financially, knowing that she can always turn to the cooperative, but she wants to be prepared for unprecedented life events. So she also avails life insurance of the coop.

Now that her one-year life insurance expires, she requests a loan to pay for its renewal and for medicines and vitamins. Isidra believes that it is better to be prepared than to be caught by unexpected circumstances.

loans.use: to pay for life insurance renewal, medicines, and vitamins.

loans.name: Edgard Magdiel

texts.es:
Edgar es un joven, muy audaz y multifacético, él está en su último año de la carrera de derecho, su sueño siempre ha sido convertirse en un gran abogado. Estudia los sábados, dado que en la semana trabaja muy duro en su pulpería, porque también a él le encanta el comercio. Junto a su esposa, hace todo para que este negocio prospere. 
Él ha recurrido a Kiva junto a MiCrédito para que se le otorgue un préstamo que le permita comprar una computadora laptop, lo cual le facilitaría la elaboración de sus trabajos universitarios, además los entregaría con mejor calidad y en tiempo. En un futuro el desea estudiar una especialización en derecho comercial, además de incursionar en otros negocios.
texts.en:
Edgar is a young man, very audacious and multi-faceted. His is studying his last year of a law degree. His dream has always been to become a great lawyer. He studies on Saturdays, given that during the week he works very hard in his grocery store, because he also loves retail. Together with his wife, he does everything he can to make sure the business can prosper. 
He has turned to Kiva together with MiCredito so that he can be granted a loan that will allow him to buy a laptop computer, which would make it easier for him to write his university papers. He would also hand them in with better quality and on time. 
In the future, he wishes to study a specialization in commercial law, and also to venture into other businesses.

loans.use: to buy a laptop computer.

loans.name: Grupo Cooperativa Group

texts.es: Una  familia humilde  y padre trabajador y muy perseverante es Paulino de 46 años de edad, que para bridarle a su familia lo mejor se dedica a la agricultura y trabaja como jornalero desde hace 10 años. Él tiene una familia de  siete hijos de las edades entre 12 y 25 años de edad, Paulino por ser un hombre que tiene mucho liderazgo es ahora el representante del grupo denominado Cooperativa. Paulino tiene la necesidad de solicitar un préstamo para la compra de insumos agrícolas que utilizara para su cultivo de esta temporada, con esta inversión él espera poder mejorar sus ingresos. Paulino tiene las esperanzas puestas en este crédito para hacer posible su cultivo en esta temporada pero también espera poder obtener mejores ganancias para construir una casa más amplia donde su familia tenga mejor estabilidad.
texts.en:
From a modest family, Paulino is a hard-working and persistent father who is 46 years old. To bring his family the best, he has worked in agriculture and as a day laborer for ten years. He has a family of seven children between the ages of 12 and 25 years. 
Paulino, who is a man who has a lot of leadership qualities, is now the representative of the group named Cooperative. Paulino has the need to ask for a loan to buy agricultural inputs which he will use for his crops this season. With this investment he hopes to be able to improve his income. 
Paulino has put his hopes on this loan to make his crops possible this season. He also hopes to be able to improve his profits to build a bigger house where his family can have more stability.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs.

loans.name: G. S. En Victoria (Nagarote) Group

texts.es:
EL G.S. VICTORIA DE NAGAROTE ESTA CONFORMADA POR TRES INTEGRANTES TRES MUJERS, MADRES SOLTERAS, CON SEIS HIJOS MENORES DE EDAD, LOS CUALES ESTAN ESTUDIANDO, SON ORIGINARIOS DE NAGAROTE LUGAR QUE SE CARACTERIZA POR SU COMIDA TIPICA, COMO QUESILLOS, TISTE, ESTAS PERSONAS SE CARACTERIZAN POR SER RESPONSABLES, TRABAJADORAS, CON GANAS DE SUPERACION PERSONAL, TODAS TINEN DIFERENTES ACTIVIDADES ECONOMICAS LAS CUALES DESEMPEÑAN YA QUE ES EL MEDIO DE SUBSISTENCIA DE SUS FAMILIAS, Y LUCHAN DIA  A DIA PARA OBTENER MEJORES GANANCIAS CADA DIA, MAYOR CLIENTELA HACER CRECER EL NEGOCIO DIA A DIA.
GRACIAS A SUS GANAS DE SUPERACION PERSONAL LA CORDINADORA ES MARIA Y TIENE POR ACTIVIDAD ECONOMICA UNA PULPERIA, ES UNA PEQUEÑA TIENDA QUE VENDE PRODUCTOS COMESTIBLES EN CANTIDADES PEQUEÑAS COMO: ARROZ, FRIJOLES, AZUCAR, LECHE, PAN, HUEVOS, DETERGENTE, CEREALES, MAIZ, JABON, PRODUCTOS DE USO PERSONAL, ETC. ELLA DEDICA A SU NEGOCIO UNAS DOCE HORAS DIARIAS OFRECIENDO SUS PRODUCTOS. EL OBJETIVO DEL CREDITO ES INVERTIR EN CAPITAL DE TRABAJO Y SURTIR SU NEGOCIO EN LA COMPRA DE PRODUCTOS COMESTIBLES PARA QUE EN UN FUTURO NO MUY LEJANO PUEDA OBTENER MEJORES INGRESOS. G.S. LA VICTORIA AGRADECE LA AYUDA QUE LOS INVERSIONISTAS KIVA LE BRINDAN A PERSONAS DE ESCASOS RECURSOS Y PAISES PAISES POBRE COMO ES NICARAGUA.
texts.en:
The G.S. Victoria of Nagarote is made up of three women who are single mothers, and together have six children who are minors and who attend school. They are originally from Nagarote, a place which is characterized by its traditional food, such as cheeses and tiste (a chocolate drink). These people are known for being responsible, hardworking, and with aim to improve themselves. They all have different economic occupations which they work in, as this is the means of subsistence for their families. They struggle day to day to obtain better profits each day, and a larger clientele to grow the business. 
Thanks to her enthusiasm to improve herself, Maria is the coordinator and her economic activity is a grocery store. It is a small store where she sells food products in small amounts, such as: rice, beans, sugar, milk, bread, eggs, detergents, cereals, corn, soap, personal use products, etc. She works in her business for 12 hours a day, offering her products. The objective of the loan is to invest in work capital and stock her business with food products so that in the not-so-distant future she can obtain a better income. 
G.G. La Victoria is grateful for the help that Kiva investors bring to people of scarce resources and poor countries, such as Nicaragua.

loans.use: to buy food products, such as: rice, beans, sugar, milk, bread, eggs, detergents, etc.

loans.name: G. S. En Victoria (La Paz Centro) Group

texts.es:
EL G.S EN VICTORIA LA PAZ CENTRO ESTA CONFORMADO POR TRES INTEGRANTES MADRES SOLTERAS CON OCHO HIJOS MENORES DE EDAD, LOS CUALES ESTAN ESTUDIANDO, LA PAZ CENTRO SE CARACTERIZA POR SU ARTESANIA, Y COMIDA TIPICA DE LA REGION, SON PERSONAS RESPONSABLES, TRABAJADORAS, CON GANAS DE SUPERACION PERSONAL, LAMENTABLENTE NO PUDIERON ESTUDIAR Y SE VIERON EN LA NECESIDAD DE TRABAJAR A TEMPRANA EDAD PARA AYUDAR CON LOS GASTOS DEL HOGAR.EN LA ACTUALIDAD LUCHAN DIA A DIA PARA BRINDARLES A A SUS HIJOS UN FUTURO MEJOR Y PROPORCIONALES UNA MEJOR CALIDAD DE VIDA, Y CUMPLIR SUEÑOS Y METAS COMO CUALQUIER PERSONA COMO ES HACER CRECER SU NEGOCIO, DARLES LA EDUCACION Y ESTABILIDAD A SUS HIJOS TANTA FISICA, ECONOMICA, EMOCIONAL Y HACERLES MEJORAS A SU VIVIENDA.

GRACIAS A SUS GANAS DE SALIR ADELANTE LA CORDINADORA ES REYNA Y TIENE POR ACTIVIDAD ECONOMICA LA PRODUCCION Y VENTAA DE LABRILLOS DE BARRO, ( MATERIAL QUE UTILIZA PARA CONSTRUCCION DE VIVIENDA ETC) EL NEGOCIO LO TIENE UBICADO EN SU CASA DE HABITACION, DESDE HACE DIES AÑOS QUE SE DEDICA A DICHA ACTIVIDAD, LA CUAL DESEMPEÑA CON MUCHO GUSTO. EL OBJETIVO DEL CREDITO ES INVERTIR EN MATERIA PRIMA PARA LA ELABORACION DE LOS LADRILLOS Y OFRECER A SUS CLIENTES UN MEJOR SERVICIO. GS EN VICTORIA AGRADECE LA AYUDA QUE LOS INVERSIONISTAS KIVA LE BRINDAN A PERSONAS DE ESCASOS RECURSOS Y PAISES POBRE COMO ES NICARAGUA PARA TENER UN MEDIO DE TRABAJO DIGNO.
texts.en:
The Solidarity Group "En Victoria (La Paz Centro)" is made up of three members who are single mothers with eight minor children who go to school. La Paz Centro is known for its handicrafts and typical food of the region. They are responsible, hard-working women with a desire for self-improvement. Regrettably, they were not able to go to school and were seen as needing to work from an early age to help with costs at home. Currently, they struggle day to day to support their children with a better future and to give them a better quality of life. To meet their dreams and goals, like any other person, they need to make their business grow so that they can give their children an education; physical, economic and emotional stability; and make improvements to their living conditions.

Thanks to their desire to be successful, the coordinator is Reyna and she earns a living by producing and selling clay bricks. She has run the business from her home for the last ten years, and she does it with pleasure. The aim of the loan is to invest in raw materials to make the bricks and to give her clients a better service. Solidarity Group En Victoria is grateful for the help that Kiva investors give to people with few resources and poor countries such as Nicaragua so they can have a dignified way of earning a living.

loans.use: to buy materials to make clay bricks.

loans.name: Agustina

texts.en:
Agustina is known in Danao, Plaridel for her delicious and palatable snacks that she sells in most of the school canteens. She is making good sales from her business.

She signed up for a membership with the cooperative and was hoping for a loan for her additional capital. Recently, she loaned an amount to purchase ingredients for a snack vending business, like bags of flour, sugar, butter, milk, cheese and other items.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for a snack vending business, like bags of flour, sugar, butter, milk, cheese and other items.

loans.name: Jeanet

texts.en:
Jeanet is driven by a passion for selling. She is 31 years old, married and lives in Macalibre Alto, Lopez Jaena. She runs a store that primarily supports their family. She never gets tired of tending her store. 

Jeanet is a fully fledged member of PMPC and has taken several loans already. She religiously paid her obligations without records of default. Now, she borrowed another loan to pay for sugar, milk, oil and noodles to sell. Having enough inventory would mean income opportunities.

In the future, she dreams of sustaining her store to continuously provide for her family.

loans.use: to buy sugar, milk, oil and noodles to sell.

loans.name: Analiza

texts.en:
Analiza has signed up for her membership with PMPC and borrowed the needed capital to start up a sari-sari store business. She is thankful for the capital it extends to a small time loaner like her. Analiza is able to turn the tide in her favor and has made good sales. She wants to take advantage of the good fortune. 

Recently, she borrowed a loan to purchase additional pigs to raise. In the future, she hopes to build a descent home for the family.

loans.use: to purchase additional pigs to raise.

loans.name: Belen

texts.en:
Belen is from Sibula, Lopez Jaena, Misamis Occidental. She is 48 years old, married, and has school-aged children. She joined Paglaum MPC and she appreciates the programs and services of the said co-op. 

From her desire to help the family, Belen engaged in selling fish in different barangays in the municipality and neighboring towns, using their motorcycle as her source of transportation to reach the different barangays and sell fish. Her source of income has existed for 19 years now. 

Belen is in need of additional working capital, and has requested financial assistance from Paglaum MPC for a loan of PHP 10,000 to purchase more stock of fish. Through this, she hopes to increase her income so she is able to provide for the daily needs of her family, and also she is happy she can support the education of her children which is her main priority of her hardship.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of fish to sell.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.en:
Alicia is 64 years old and lives in Eastern Looc, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental. She is married with three adult age children. 

Alicia has a fish vending business and owns a fishing boat business. She earns approximately PHP 9,000 each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase a fish net and floaters for her fishing business. Alicia has been a member of PMPC for nine years.

loans.use: to purchase a fish net and floaters for her fishing business.

loans.name: Ana Leah

texts.en:
Ana Leah is 36 years old, married, and lives in Danao, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental. As a microfinance member of Paglaum MPC, she is given priority in financial services to alleviate her present financial conditions with the necessary financial literacy and other training in which she actively participated. 

Ana Leah had seen changes in her general living condition from the moment she signed up for membership with the cooperative. She has purchased a motorcab for use in her fish selling activities. 

This time, she is asking for a loan of PHP 20,000 to purchase materials for boat making, such as lumber, plywood, bronze nails, sealant, paint, bamboo, boat engine and fishing nets.

loans.use: to purchase materials for boat making, such as lumber, plywood, bronze nails, sealant, paint, bamboo, boat engine and fishing nets.

loans.name: Leoncio

texts.en:
Leoncio is 56 years old, widowed, and lives at Sibula, Lopez Jaena, Philippines. 

In order to earn a living, he takes in and raises pigs from the neighborhood. The piglets' owners share in profit upon sale, to be divided 60/40 or 70/30 depending on their agreement.  With a desire to earn more, he decided to raise pigs on his own as well. Through Pauglam PC he obtained the capital to purchase his own piglets and feed. 

Now, Leoncio requests a loan of 12,000 PHP to buy additional feed. He really hopes and prays that his business would grow and benefit his family, in addition to his income. Someday, he wants to build a concrete pig cage to easily keep more sanitary conditions.

loans.use: to buy additional bags of feed.

loans.name: Juanita

texts.en:
Juanita is 45 years old, and is married with one child. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Juanita has an Avon dealership business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy more Avon products to sell.

Juanita has been in this business for seven years. In the future, Juanita would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more Avon products to sell.

loans.name: Leah

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Leah works hard to support her family.

She has an eatery business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from buying and selling ready to wear items.  Leah is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to buy ingredients for her business, like meat, fish, spices, etc. 

Leah has been sustaining her business activities through her past four loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her business like meat, fish, spices, etc.

loans.name: Crecencia

texts.en:
Crecencia is 65 years old and married with thirteen children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Crecencia runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 22,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, liquor, eggs, home care products, and other groceries.

Crecencia has been in this business for 35 years and sells a variety of items.

In the future, Crecencia would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, liquor, eggs, home care products, and other groceries.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with nine children.

She has a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional groceries to sell.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Elizabeth dreams that one day she will be able to save enough money so she can continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries to sell.

loans.name: Ma. Cecilia

texts.en:
James Dexter is 20 years old and is the fifth of six children in the family. His mother Ma. Cecilia supports the family through her soap vending business in the Philippines.

James Dexter is studying for a Bachelor of Science in Information Technology and is currently in his first year of this four-year course.

Ma. Cecilia is borrowing 14,500 PHP to pay for tuition fees of the first semester of the school year 2015-16.

When he graduates, James Dexter plans to be a successful businessman and professional programmer

loans.use: to pay for tuition fees

loans.name: Rowena

texts.en:
Rowena is 42 years old, married and has three children, two of whom are enrolled in school.

Rowena is in the agricultural business, raising livestock in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy feed and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Rowena has been raising livestock for six years now, and has borrowed 11 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Rowena would like to save money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her livestock.

loans.name: Ana

texts.en:
Ana is a 32-year-old married mother of four children who works hard to support her family. She is a teacher and her husband is also a teacher. Although the family works very hard, it can be difficult for them to afford the cost of their son’s education.

This loan of $1000 will allow Ana to send her son, Jovito, to post-primary school. She will use the loan to pay for tuition and school supplies and things that he needs. Ana loves her son very much and hopes that further education will help him to have a brighter and happy future.

loans.use: to pay for tuition and school supplies for her son and things that he needs.

loans.name: Natalia

texts.en: She is taking a loan of $600 from TRM. She is married and she has four children. She is using the loan to buy thread to make traditional clothes. After that she will go out and carry it and sell it at the market to help her family in the household. Her husband is a farmer. She is happy with this loan because it will improve her living conditions in the future.

loans.use: To buy  thread.

loans.name: Dionesia

texts.en: Dionesia is a 72-year-old widow from Panalsalan, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental. She is a pensioner member of Paglaum MPC and enjoyed all the benefits of membership. Recently, she availed herself of a loan to purchase maintenance medicines and vitamins.

loans.use: to purchase maintenance medicines and vitamins

loans.name: Artemia

texts.en: Artemia signed up for her membership with PMPC and obtained the needed capital to start up a sari-sari store business. She is thankful for the capital that was extended to a small-time borrower like her. Artemia was able to turn the tide in her favor and is making good sales these days. She wants to take advantage of the good fortune. Recently, she took a loan to restock her store with basic commodities, like canned goods, oil, and soy sauce. In the future, she hopes to build a decent home for the family.

loans.use: to restock her store with items like canned goods, oil, and soy sauce.

loans.name: Fely

texts.en: Fely learned about Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative and the financial assistance it gives start-ups. Fely tried her luck doing a business focusing on her farming activities. She feels she owes her fortune to the Cooperative for having trusted her with the money she used as capital. Fely borrowed another amount to pay for seedlings and compost. This will help her farming income get a big boost. Fely looks for better business opportunities and would love to be in the position to help others.

loans.use: to pay for seedlings and compost

location.town: SINDANGAN - LAGAG, SINDANGAN, ZAMBOANGA DEL NORTE

loans.name: Candida Del Carmen

texts.es:
Cándida es una mujer de cuarenta y ocho años de edad, muy alegre y trabajadora, tiene veinte cuatro años de tener su negocio de venta de verduras y calzado. Ella ya ha sido beneficiada con otros créditos, gracias a estos ha logrado sacar su negocio a flote, está muy agradecida por las oportunidades que se le han brindado.  
En estos momentos ha vuelto a recurrir a un préstamo de Kiva junto a MiCrédito, para poder abastecerse de productos nuevos en calzados, comprar zapatos de diferentes estilos, dado que la clientela demanda estilos y tallas variadas en esta temporada del año. En un futuro desea poder mejorar la infraestructura de local, además  poder incursionar en otros negocios.
texts.en:
Cándida is 48 years old. She is very happy and hard-working. She has had a business selling vegetables and footwear for 24 years. She has already benefited from other loans. Thanks to these, she has managed to keep her business afloat. Cándida is very grateful for these opportunities that have been given to her.

Cándida has come to Kiva and MiCrédito for another loan that she will use to stock up with new footwear and to buy different styles of shoes as customers want various styles and sizes at this time of year. In the future, Cándida wants to improve her premises and to open other businesses.

loans.use: to buy different styles of shoes.

loans.name: Claudia Del Rosario

texts.es:
A los 25 años, Claudia deseaba tener sus propios ingresos, ser su propia jefa y poder tener algo que le ayudara a salir adelante como madre soltera de tres hijos. Fue entonces cuando decidió establecer su pulpería como dinero que tenía ahorrado, siendo este su primer y único negocio. Sin embargo sus sueños no se quedan estancados ahí, ella sueña con extenderse más adelante.
Ahora Claudia tiene 51 años de edad y se siente orgullosa de ver que sus hijos ya son independientes. Una hija, es la que la apoya al cien por ciento en el negocio, lo que la hace sentirse acompañada en este trayecto que desea siga creciendo. Debido a sus grandes deseos de superación, ella solicita un préstamo para comprar gaseosa, jugos, agua, pan, arroz, frijoles, entre otros productos necesarios para surtir su negocio. Su próximo plan es poner otro establecimiento en otro lugar.
texts.en:
At 25 years old, Claudia wanted to earn her own income, be her own boss, and to have something to help her move forward as a single mother of three children. It was then that she decided to open a grocery store with money she had saved. This was her first and only business. However, Claudia's dreams did not stop there. She now dreams of doing more in the future.

Claudia is now 51 years old and is proud to see that her children are now independent. One of her daughters supports her 100% at her business, providing company as she moves along this career path where she wants to keep growing. Owing to her big wish to do better, Claudia is applying for a loan in order to buy fizzy drinks, juices, water, bread, rice, beans and other products necessary to stock up her business. Claudia's next goal is to open another shop at another location.

loans.use: to buy fizzy drinks, juices, water, bread, rice, beans and other products.

loans.name: Jorge Ulises

texts.es:
Jorge es un joven deseoso de oportunidades y de grandes proyectos. Razón por la cual a sus 23 años de edad, estudia, es padre de un bebé de un mes, es esposo de una mujer que lo apoya al cien por ciento, al igual que su padre, y trabaja como gestor bancario en una gasolinera de su pueblo. Anteriormente él ya había tenido dos trabajos más, pues le gusta ir escalando para conseguir sus sueños.
El mayor sueño de Jorge es sacar adelante y cuidar muy bien de su pequeña familia, por lo que solicita un préstamo para comprar cemento, inodoro, ducha, bloques, láminas de zinc, tuberías y azulejos para construir su baño. Esto le permitirá mejorar la calidad de vida de él y de su familia, ya no estarán expuestos a insectos ni enfermedades que producen debido a la mala higiene. Al cancelar el préstamo desea seguir apoyando a sus madres a mejorar la casa y también finalizar su carrera universitaria de inglés.
texts.en:
Jorge is a young man looking for opportunities and big projects. This is why, at 23 years of age, he studies and is a father to a one-month.old baby. Jorge is the husband of a woman who supports him 100%, just as his father does. Jorge works as an accounts assistant at a petrol station in his local town. Previously, he worked in two other roles but he likes to move in to better roles in order to achieve his dreams.

Jorge's biggest dream is to move forward and look after his little family. He is therefore applying for a loan in order to buy cement, a toilet, shower, bricks, zinc sheets, pipes and glazed tiles and build a bathroom. This will allow provide him and his family with a higher quality of life. They will no longer be exposed to insects and diseases that are the result of poor hygiene.

When he pays off his debt, Jorge would like to continue supporting his mother to improve her house, and to finish his university degree in English.

loans.use: to buy cement, a toilet, shower, bricks, zinc sheets, pipes and glazed tiles.

loans.name: Belinda

texts.en:
Belinda is a married woman with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Belinda is 33 years old now.

Belinda has a "buy and sell" frozen foods business in the Philippines. Belinda requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy frozen foods like hot dogs, ham, etc.

Belinda has been in this business for three years. In the future, Belinda would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy frozen foods like hot dogs, ham, etc.

loans.name: Alfredo Giovany

texts.es:
Alfredo un hombre que se esmera día con día para bridarle a su familia lo necesario  él tiene 29 años de edad, es casado con una familia de tres hijos de las edades entre 4 y 8 años, está linda familia vive en una comunidad de Sololá.
Alfredo su actividad económica es trabajar de albañil y lo realiza desde hace 8 años,  lo hace con el único fin de sostener a su familia, la ubicación de su actividad es el área de Escuintla un lugar lejano de su residencia. Alfredo ha considerado necesario solicitar un préstamo, porque necesita realizar la construcción de una cocina para su hogar, porque hasta ahora él y su familia no cuentan con un lugar donde preparar los alimentos, con el préstamo él comprara cemento, cal, arena y block.
Su más gran anhelo es realizar la construcción  lo más pronto posible y ver a sus hijos convertidos en grandes profesionales.
texts.en:
Alfredo is a man who strives everyday to provide for his family's needs. He is 29 years old, married and has a family of three children aged between 4 and 8 years old. This beautiful family lives in a community in Sololá.

Alfredo makes a living working as a bricklayer. He has been doing this work for eight years and he does it with the sole purpose of supporting his family. His work is based in the province of Escuintla, faraway from where he lives. Alfredo has decided he needs to request a loan as he needs to build a kitchen for his home. Until now, he and his family have had nowhere to prepare food but, with a loan, he will buy cement, lime, sand and blocks.

His greatest wishes are to build this kitchen as soon as possible and to see his children become great professionals.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Thêm

texts.en:
Mrs Thêm is 52 years old and she is married. She has been working in agriculture growing vegetable crops for 7 years. Thêm lives in Quang Xuong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

Her family is a low-income household in the village, moreover the market need is low in this region. And the income from this business is not high enough to provide what she really needs for comfort in her life.

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a new toilet.

This is Thêm's first loan with Thanh Hoa microfinance institution. She hopes that this loan could make her little dream come true.

With her business profit, Thêm hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, and to maintain a successful business.

loans.use: To purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a new toilet

loans.name: Belinda

texts.en:
Belinda is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with two children.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Belinda dreams that one day, she will be able to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Elsa

texts.en:
As a married parent of one child, Elsa works hard to support her family.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Elsa is borrowing PHP 20000 through NWTF to buy ingredients like vegetable, oil, sugar, etc. for her food vending business.

Elsa has been sustaining her business activities through her past 8 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like vegetable, oil, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Essi

texts.fr: Agée de 39 ans, Essi  est une femme mariée et mère de trois enfants vivant ensemble à Tokoin. Pour soutenir sa famille, Essi vend des mèches et tissages dans son salon de coiffure et s’approvisionne une fois par mois au marché. Essi réalise sa rentabilité dans son activité et pour bien satisfaire aux besoins de ses clients, Essi nécessite ce crédit pour commander des champoing afin d’agrandir son stock et aider ses enfants dans leur éducation scolaire et à couvrir les besoins quotidiens de la famille.
texts.en:
Essi is 39 years old, married, and a mother of three children. They all live in Tokoin.

To support her family, Essi sells hair extensions and weaves in her hair salon. She procures her stock once a month at a market.

Essi earns a living from this business. As a way to satisfy her customers, Essi needs this loan to order shampoo. This purchase will allow her to increase her stock and help her children in their education. She will also be able to cover the family's daily expenses.

loans.use: to buy 28 units of hair extensions and five units of shampoo.

loans.name: Almenita

texts.en:
Almenita has requested a $ 1000 loan to improve her business. She is married and she has three children and she has a kiosk where many people come to buy every day.

With her loan she will buy some additional supplies such as noodles, cigarettes, sugar,salt, milk, water, biscuits, slippers, fish, coffee and rice. She has been involved in business activities since 2014. She feels so comfortable running her business because she can earn money every day.

Running a business has made Almenita independent because she can be responsible for herself and also help her family. She hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: to buy noodles, cigarettes, sugar, salt, milk, water, biscuits, slippers, fish, coffee and rice.

loans.name: Ediltrudes

texts.en:
Ediltrudes is a married woman and 51 years old. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.
Ediltrudes has a shells craft business in the Philippines. Ediltrudes requested a PHP 25000 loan through NWTF to buy shells, etc. to use in her business.

Ediltrudes has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, Ediltrudes would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy shells, thread, etc. to use in her business.

loans.name: Rhoda

texts.en:
Rhoda is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Rhoda is 30 years old and both of her children are enrolled in school.

Rhoda has a general store business in the Philippines. Rhoda requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries like canned good, snack food and other personal care products to sell.

Rhoda has been in this business for eight years. In the future, Rhoda would like to save enough money so she can continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries like canned good, snack food and other personal care products to sell.

loans.name: Ivania

texts.es:
La sonrisa de Ivania, te da la bienvenida a su pequeña casa, donde ha sacado adelante como madre soltera a sus tres hijos. Hace un año, esta emprendedora de 39 años de edad, decidió vender productos cosméticos de Avon, pues lo miró como una oportunidad de generar ingresos para su familia. Afortunadamente ella cuenta con el apoyo de su madre y cuenta con un trabajo distinto los fines de semanas, donde vende frutas en el puesto de una amiga. 
Ivania siempre está pendiente de su familia y de su salud, por eso para ella es importante invertir en ella. Razón por la cual solicita un préstamo para comprar tubos, inodoro, ducha, azulejos, cemento, entre otros materiales de construcción para instalar su baño y así poder cambiar de una letrina a un inodoro digno para ella y su familia. Esto le permitirá a no seguir expuesta a enfermedades por la mala higiene. Al cancelar pretender mejorar su casa y si puede comprar una nueva.
texts.en:
Ivania's smile welcomes you to her small house, where as a single mother she has provided for her three children. A year ago this enterprising 39-year-old decided to start selling Avon cosmetics, seeing it as an opportunity to generate income for her family. Fortunately she has the support of her mother and she has another job on weekends, selling fruit at a friend's stall.

Ivania always takes care of her family and her family's health, and she considers it important to spend money on it. For this reason she is applying for a loan to buy pipes, a toilet, a shower, tiles, cement, and other building materials to install a bathroom so that she and her family can upgrade from a latrine to a decent toilet. This will mean they will no longer be exposed to diseases caused by poor hygiene. Upon paying it back she aims to improve her home and if she can, buy a new one.

loans.use: to purchase pipes, a toilet, a shower, tiles, cement and other construction materials.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is a married woman with one child in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Josephine is 55 years old now.

Josephine has a boarding house rental business in the Philippines. Josephine requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy needed materials, like wood, etc., to use in her business.

Josephine has been in this business for ten years. In the future, Josephine would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy needed materials, like wood, etc., to use in her business.

loans.name: Adjoavi

texts.fr: Adjoavi est une femme mariée âgée de 55 ans résidante à Tokoin. Mère de cinq enfants, Adjoavi produit les gâteaux et des amuse-gueules.  Adjoavi s’approvisionne une fois par mois du nécessaire et le revend à  la devanture de son domicile et dans les quartiers environnant. Adjoavi désire ce prêt pour commander des bols d’arachide et de farine de blé.  Avec la marge bénéficiaire qui en résultera, Adjoavi compte améliorer sa prestation de vente et aider ses enfants à avoir un épanouissement et une bonne éducation.
texts.en:
Adjoavi is 55 years old, married, and lives in Tokoin. She has five children.

Adjoavi makes cakes and snacks. She procures her ingredients once a month as needed. She makes her sales from the front of her home and in the surrounding neighborhoods.

Adjoavi is seeking this loan so that she can order bowls of groundnuts and wheat flour.

With her profits, Adjoavi hopes to improve her business and help her children develop and receive a good education.

loans.use: to buy 30 bowls of groundnuts and two bowls of wheat flour.

loans.name: Afoua Esperance

texts.fr: Espérance est une femme mariée âgée de 46 ans qui habite à Tokoin. Mère d’un enfant, Espérance est une revendeuse de fruits qui s’approvisionne une fois par mois au marché. Espérance revend ses marchandises à domicile et dans les quartiers environnant. Espérance demande ce crédit pour commander des paniers de bananes plantains en vue de gagner des bénéfices et maximiser son profit et favoriser l’éducation scolaire de son enfant.
texts.en:
Espérance is 46 years old, married, and lives in Tokoin. She has one child.

Espérance sells goods from her home and in the surrounding areas. She is seeking this loan to order baskets of plantains, with the goal of earning and maximizing a profit [so that she can] send her child to school.

loans.use: to buy 50 baskets of plantains.

loans.name: Magdalena

texts.en:
Magdalena is a married woman with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Magdalena is 47 years old and one of her children is in school.

Magdalena has a shells craft business in the Philippines. Magdalena requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy more shells cover, and other materials needed in her business.

Magdalena has been in this business for six years. In the future, Magdalena would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more shells cover, and other materials needed in her business

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es:
Frases como “pase adelante y llevese las verduras más frescas del mercado” o “tenemos tomate, banano, chiltoma, papas, apio…” son las que logran captar clientes ara Julio, un hombre de 41 años de edad que lleva más de dos años con su negocio de venta de frutas y verduras en el mercado. Él siempre ha trabajado en el comercio de verduras, sin embargo no fue hasta hace poco que estableció su propio negocio.
Julio es padre de un pequeño de siete años de edad, quien desea ver convertido como un gran profesional, al igual que su esposa, quien siempre está apoyándolo en el puesto de venta. La visión de este emprendedor siempre está lista, por lo que solicita un préstamo para comprar frutas y verduras, tomate, cebolla, chiltoma, apio, naranja, sandia, entre otros productos que tanto piden sus clientes. Esto le permitirá a surtir y mantener lleno su negocio. En sus planes está mejorar su casa para hacer una parte de esta una bodega.
texts.en:
Phrases like "Roll up and take home the freshest vegetables in the market" or "we have tomatoes, bananas, sweet peppers, potatoes, celery..." manage to attract customers for Julio, a 41-year-old who has made a living for two years from his business selling fruit and vegetables in the market. He has always worked in the vegetable trade; however it was not until recently that he set up his own business.

Julio is the father of a seven-year-old son, who he wishes to see grow up to become a great professional, along with his wife, who is always helping him at his stall. His entrepreneurial vision is always prepared, which is why he is requesting a loan to purchase fruit and vegetables, including tomatoes, onions, bell peppers, celery, oranges and watermelons, items which his customers often ask for. This will allow him to stock up and maintain his business well-stocked. He plans to renovate his home to make a part of it into a storehouse.

loans.use: to purchase items such as tomatoes, onions, peppers, celery, oranges and watermelons

loans.name: Lidia

texts.es: Doña Lidia de 52 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella se dedica a la venta de cocos desde hace 17 años, vende de manera ambulante por las diferentes colonias y con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra salir adelante, ella esta solicitando un credito para la compra de mas cocos por mayor para continuar con sus ventas y asi tener mejores ingresos economicos.
texts.en: Lidia is 52 years old and lives in her own home with her family. For 17 years she has made a living selling coconuts; she sells as a street vendor in different colonies. She manages to get ahead with what she earns from sales. She is requesting a loan to buy more coconuts wholesale, so that she can continue selling and therefore have a better income.

loans.use: to buy more coconuts wholesale.

loans.name: Marvin

texts.en:
Marvin is 33 years old and married with five children. With four children in school, Marvin works very hard to provide for them.

Marvin runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like rice, personal care products, and other groceries.

Marvin has been in this business for eight years. She sells a variety of items such as rice, sugar, soap, and other groceries.

In the future, Marvin would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like rice, personal care products, and other groceries.

loans.name: Twibukanye Group

texts.fr:
Claver  fait partie du groupe  Twibukanyeet  habite à  Bujumbura. Il a 51 ans et est marié à Daphrose ,une cultivatrice. 
Il a sous sa charge 3enfants membre de sa famille élargie qui étudient. 


Il fait le commerce de la bière de banane  depuis  6 ans. 


Il est à son troisième   crédit  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’Il obtient, il  va  augmenter son capital et acheter  lune grande quantité de bananes à transformer en  bière de banane à vendre pour gagner plus. 


Dans les prochaines  années, Il voudrait  être grossiste de vente de bière.
texts.en:
Claver is a member of the Twibukanye group and lives in Bujumbura. He is 51 years old and is married to Daphrose, a farmer. They take care of three children from their extended family. The children are in school.

Claver has been selling banana beer for six years. He is on this third loan with Turame. With this Kiva-financed loan, he is going to increase his capital and buy a large amount of bananas that he will make into beer. He will then sell the beer to earn more.

In the coming years, Claver would like to sell beer at wholesale.

loans.use: to buy a large amount of bananas to make into beer.

loans.name: Nanette

texts.en:
Nanette is 45 years old and married with three children. With all three children enrolled in school, Nanette works very hard to provide for them.

Nanette has a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase additional groceries to sell.

Nanette has been in this business for seven years. She sells a variety of items such as sugar, soap, detergent and other groceries.

In the future, Nanette would like to save enough money so she continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries to sell

loans.name: Senga Group

texts.fr:
Radjabu fait partie du groupe  Senga et  habite à  Bujumbura. Il a 44 ans et est marié à Asha ,une commerçante. Ensemble ils ont 6 enfants âgés de 2 à 17 ans,dont  4 étudient. 


Il fait le commerce de  poissons  depuis  15 ans. 


Il est à son vingt-deuxième   crédit  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu'il obtient, il  va  augmenter son capital et acheter  beaucoup de poissons à revendre pour gagner plus. 


Dans les prochaines  années, il voudrait  ouvrir une pharmacie et voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Radjabu is a member of the Senga group and lives in Bujumbura. He is 44 years old and married to Asha, a merchant. Together, they have six children, aged from two to 17 years old. Four of the children are in school.

Radjabu has been selling fish for 15 years. He is on his 22nd loan with Turame. With this Kiva-financed loan, he is going to increase his capital to buy a large amount of fish that he will resell to earn more.

In the coming years, he would like to open a pharmacy and see his children go to school.

loans.use: to buy a large amount of fish.

loans.name: Augusto Cesar

texts.es:
Augusto es un hombre de cuarenta y un años de edad, muy estudioso y decidido a ser un buen profesional. El estudio Contaduría pública, en una universidad estatal, siguiendo los pasos de su padre. Trabaja en el área de finanzas de una empresa importante en su ciudad. Con el apoyo de su esposa ha ido abriéndose campo en el mundo laboral. 
En estos momentos, Augusto, está decidido a crecer como contador, por eso ha recurrido a Kiva y MiCrédito para que se le otorgue un préstamo que le permita pagar una maestría. Tener este otro título le permitiría optar a un mejor puesto de trabajo. Él es un hombre comprometido con su profesión, en un futuro se ve  como el director del área de finanzas.
texts.en:
Augusto is 41 years of age. He is very studious and determined to be a good professional. He is studying Public Accounting in a state university, following in the footsteps of his father. He works in finance in an important company in his city. With the support of his wife he has broadened his horizons in the world of employment.

Augusto is determined to his development as an accountant, and for this reason he is requesting a loan from Kiva and MiCredito that will allow him to pay for his masters. Having this qualification would allow him to get a better job. He is committed to his profession, and in the future he sees himself as the director of the finance department.

loans.use: to pay for his masters degree.

loans.name: Vivian

texts.en:
Vivian is a 48-year-old single woman with four children. Three of her children are still in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Vivian has a "buy and sell" slippers business in the Philippines. Vivian requested a PHP 4,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional shoes and slippers to sell in her stall.

Vivian has been in this business for ten years. She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional shoes and slippers to sell in her stall.

loans.name: Humuriza Group

texts.fr:
Sauda  fait partie du groupe  Humuriza et  habite à  Bujumbura. Elle a 47 ans et est divorcée. Elle a 4 enfants âgés de 17 à 29 ans,tous   étudient.
Elle a sous sa charge 3 enfants . 

Elle fait le commerce de  pagnes  depuis  17 ans. 

Elle est à son cinquième   crédit  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et acheter  beaucoup de pagnes  à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, elle voudrait  devenir importatrice de pagnes et voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Sauda is a member of the Humuriza group who lives in Bujumbura. She is 47 years old and divorced. She is the mother of four children ranging from 17 to 29 years of age, all have been or still are in school. She has three dependent children. Sauda has been selling traditional colorful "pagnes" fabric for 17 years. This is her fifth loan with Turame.

Thanks to the Kiva loan, Sauda will bolster her capital and buy many sets of "pagnes" for sale in order to increase her savings. In the years to come, she would like to start importing traditonal fabric and provide for her children's studies.

loans.use: to stock up on traditional fabric to increase her earnings.

loans.name: Tumika Group

texts.fr:
Mugeni fait parti du groupe Tumika, et habite  à Bujumbura. C’est une célibataire de 41 ans. Elle a un enfant de 17 ans qui étudie. Elle a à sa charge sa grande sœur et son enfant.

Elle a un salon de coiffure depuis 19 ans.

Elle est à son quatrième cycle. Avec le crédit de Kiva, elle va acheter beaucoup de  produits de beauté pour servir plus de clients afin de gagner plus.


Dans les prochaines années, elle voudrait vendre des produits de beaute.
texts.en:
Mugeni is a member of the Tumika group and lives in Bujumbura. She is 41 years old, single, and has one child who is 17 years old and in school. She also takes care of her older sister and her child.

Mugeni has had a hair salon for 19 years. She is on her fourth loan. With this Kiva-financed loan, she is going to buy a large amount of beauty products as a way to serve her customers and earn more.

In the coming years, she would like to [continue to] sell beauty products.

loans.use: to buy beauty products.

loans.name: Komeza Group

texts.fr:
Felix  fait partie du groupe  Komeza et  habite à  Bujumbura. Il a 45 ans et est marié à Lenate ,une cultivatrice. Ensemble ils ont 3 enfants âgés de 5 à 15 ans,  3 étudient.


Il fait la photographie  depuis  10 ans. 


Il est son dixième   crédit  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il obtient, il  va  augmenter son capital mettre en place un studio photo pour servir beaucoup de clients ,afin  de gagner plus.  


Dans les prochaines  années, il voudrait  acheter un camera ,et voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Felix is a member of the Komeza group and lives in Bujumbura. He is 45 years old and is married to Lenate, a farmer. Together they have three children, aged from five to 15 years old. Three of the children are in school.

Felix has been a photographer for 10 years. He is on his 10th loan with Turame. With this Kiva-financed loan, he is going to increase his capital to set up a photo studio as a way to serve his customers and earn more.

In the coming years, he would like to buy a [new] camera and see his children go to school.

loans.use: to set up a photo studio.

loans.name: Albert

texts.fr:
Albert est un brave père de famille. Il a trois  petits enfants de 1 à 5 ans. Les deux premiers seulement sont scolarisés. C'est un père de famille responsable et travailleur, très diligent au bien-être de sa famille.
Il est marié, et sa femme dirige un petit stand d'alimentation, Quant à lui, il fabrique des pâtes pour nems et s'occupe de l'élevage de poulets de chair. Il a débuté la seconde activité en 2011. Pour améliorer le revenu familial et le niveau de vie de la famille, il envisage de développer et étendre davantage cette activité. C'est la raison pour laquelle, il collabore avec CEFOR pour demander un prêt.
Son objectif est de s'efforcer d'épargner davantage d'abord,  et ensuite construire sa propre maison pour éviter de louer pendant long temps.
texts.en:
Albert is a brave father of a family. He has three small children between one and five years old. The two oldest are in school. Albert is responsible and hardworking, and he is very diligent in his family's well-being. He is married, and his wife manages a small food kiosk. As for him, he makes dough for spring rolls and raises broiler chickens.

He started raising broiler chickens only in 2011. To improve his family's earnings and standard of living, he hopes to expand this second business. And it is for this reason that he is collaborating with CEFOR and seeking this loan.

His goal is to increase his savings first, and then build a his own house as a way to avoid paying rent over a long period of time.

loans.use: to buy 70 chicks and four sacs of feed.

loans.name: Ana Isabel

texts.es:
Ana, de 46 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, es viuda desde hace 12 años, tiene 4 hijos, uno está fuera del país y los otros tres están en hogares apartes, actualmente solo vive una nieta.

Ana, es comerciante de frutas y verduras desde hace 5 años, actualmente solo vende jocotes porque es la fruta que está en cosecha, pero también se dedica a la crianza de pollos, anteriormente solicito un crédito para construir la galera donde almacena a los pollos, es pequeño negocio lo tiene desde hace un año.

El préstamo que está solicitando es para comprar 300 pollos de engorde, porque gasto el dinero que tenia para el negocio, porque el hijo que vive fuera del país sufrió un accidente y por eso ella tuvo que ayudarle.

Ana, sueña con tener una granja grande de pollos y así poder tener más ingresos y surtir las tiendas de la comunidad.
texts.en:
Ana, who is 46 years of age, did not have the opportunity to study. She has been a widow for 12 years and has 4 children. One lives abroad and the other three live separately from her. She currently lives with just her granddaughter.

Ana has been a fruit and vegetable seller for 5 years. She currently only sells jocote ( a local fruit) because it is the fruit that is being harvested, but she also makes a living raising chickens.

She requested a previous loan to build a hen-house to keep her chickens in. It is a small business that she has had for a year.

The loan that she is requesting is to purchase 300 broiler chickens, because she spent the money that she had for the business as her son who lives abroad had an accident and as a result she had to help him. Ana dreams of having a large chicken farm so she can get a better income and supply the shops in her community.

loans.use: to purchase 300 broiler chickens

loans.name: Jene

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Jene works hard to support her family.

She has a rice retail business in the Philippines. She also earns additional income from a general store. Jene is borrowing PHP 4,000 through NWTF to purchase more sacks of rice to sell in her store for her rice retail business.

Jene hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more sacks of rice to sell in her store.

loans.name: Leonisa

texts.en:
Leonisa is a married woman with eight children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Leonisa is 54 years old now.

Leonisa has a shell craft business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy shell cover, thread, and other materials needed to use in her business.

Leonisa has been in this business for six years. In the future, Leonisa would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy shell cover, thread, and other materials needed to use in her business

loans.name: Edgar René

texts.es: Edgar es un hombre de 40 años de edad, vive junto a su familia de cuatro hijos de las edades entre 1 y 10 años en una comunidad de San Miguel Suchitepéquez. Para Edgar su familia es muy importante, y con fin de obtener sus ingresos se dedica a la compra y venta de pollo por libra, con este negocio lleva  ocho años de realizarlo, para él este negocio es muy rentable porque lo hace desde la comunidad de su hogar, y para obtener otro ingreso trabaja como albañil en los lugares circunvecinos. Edgar para hacer aún más rentable su negocio ha decidido solicitar un préstamo para la compra de pollos de crianza para cuando ya estén grandes, desplumarlos y venderlos por libra que actualmente es su actividad económica, con esta inversión Edgar busca mejorar sus ganancias para  luego construir un corral más grande donde pueda crear mejor sus pollos.
texts.en:
Edgar is 40 years old and lives with his family of four children, aged between 1 and 10, in a community in San Miguel Suchitepéquez. Edgar's family is very important to him. To earn an income, he buys and sells chickens by the pound, and has been making a living this way for eight years. It is very profitable for him as he runs his business from home. To earn additional income he works as a bricklayer in the surrounding areas.

To make his business even more proftable, Edgar has decided to request a loan to buy chickens for raising; when they are big, he will pluck them and sell them by the pound, as he does now. With this investment, Edgar is looking to improve his profits; he will then be able to build a bigger pen, where he can better raise his chickens.

loans.use: to buy chickens for raising to sell by the pound.

loans.name: Jean Claude

texts.fr:
42 ans, marié, Jean Claude est un père de famille débrouillard, travailleur et responsable. Il a quatre enfants à sa charge, ils sont âgés de 9 à 18 ans et il sont tous scolarisés dans des écoles privées. Il est un père très fier de ses enfants et de sa femme. 
Les deux époux exercent ensemble l'activité génératrice de revenu de la famille qu'est la fabrication des semelles. Ils se soutiennent mutuellement pour le bien de leurs enfants. 
Son objectif est de pouvoir offrir à ses enfants les meilleures éducations pour qu'ils puissent avoir des bons carrières plus tard et ne pas à subir les mêmes sorts que lui.C'est un père de famille très courageux qui mérite d'être aidé et soutenu.
texts.en:
Jean Claude is 42 years old, married, and a father of a resourceful, responsible, and hardworking family. He has four children under his care, who are between nine and 18 years old. All attend private school. He is a father who is proud of his children and his wife.

Jean Claude and his wife together work to earn a living by making shoe soles. They support each other for the good of their children.

Jean Claude's goal is to be able to offer his children a better education so that they can have good careers later and not endure the same hard life he has had. He is a brave father of a family who deserves to be helped and supported.

loans.use: to buy plastic materials.

loans.name: Philomène

texts.fr:
Philomène est une femme travailleuse et débrouillarde de 43 ans. Elle est mariée et  ils ont deux enfants. Ces derniers ont 15 et 19 ans et sont respectivement en classe de 3ème et Terminale. Monsieur travaille en tant qu'Agent de sécurité. Et Philomène exerce une activité de vente de légumes, et ce depuis 2011. Auparavant, elle était marchande ambulante de beignets sucrés.
Son ambition est de devenir une grossiste de marchande de légumes, c'est pourquoi, elle voudrait développer et étendre  son commerce. Elle voudrait augmenter et améliorer le revenu de la famille afin de pouvoir, par conséquent, améliorer le niveau de vie de la famille, continuer à financer les études de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Philomène is a hardworking and resourceful woman who is 43 years old. She is married and has two children. They are 15 and 19 years old and are in the third class and the final class in high school, respectively. Philomène's husband is a security agent.

Philomène has worked selling vegetables since 2011. Before that she was traveling around selling sugared donuts.

Her goal is to become a vegetable wholesaler, and this is the reason she would like to develop and expand her business.

Philomène would like to increase and improve her family's earnings as a way to improve their standard of living and to continue financing her children's education.

loans.use: to buy various kinds of vegetables, such as potatoes, beans, peas, carrots, etc.

loans.name: Reynaldo De Jesus

texts.es:
El sonido de la cortadora, el olor a barniz y la creatividad de muebles al entrar al negocio de Reynaldo, te hacen entrar al mundo impresionante de este ebanista de 64 años de edad. Desde hace veinte años, este emprendedor decidió poner su creatividad a flote y crear muebles innovadores, haciéndolo reconocido en su vecindario. 
Reynaldo cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa y de su tres hijos que le mandan remesas mensualmente. Esto le ha permitido hacer crecer un poco más rápido su negocio. Sin embargo, él quiere seguir invirtiendo, por lo que solicita un préstamo para comprar clavos, pega, lijas, pintura, entre otros materiales indispensables para la elaboración de muebles. Esta inversión le permitirá cumplir con los pedidos a tiempo y entregar unos muebles de calidad. En sus planes está seguir trabajando fuerte para extender su negocio.
texts.en:
The sound of the saw, the smell of varnish and the creativity of the furniture upon entering Reynaldo's business help you you enter the amazing world of this 64-year-old furniture maker.

Twenty years ago, this entrepreneur decided to put his creativity to use to create innovative furniture and made it known in his neighborhood. Reynaldo has the support of his wife and their three children who send remittances monthly. This has allowed him to develop his business a little faster. However, he wants to continue to invest, so he is requesting a loan to buy nails, glue, sandpaper, paint, and other essential materials for furniture making. This investment will allow him to complete orders on time and deliver quality furniture. He plans to keep working hard to expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase nails, glue, sandpaper, paint and other materials.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more fish in bulk.

loans.name: Guadalupe

texts.es: Guadalupe de 39 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida, ella se dedica a la venta de mariscos desde hace 11 años, vende de manera ambulante por las diferentes colonias y ya tiene clientes fijos, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella esta solicitando un credito para la compra de mas mariscos por mayor para poder tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Guadalupe, 39 years old, lives in her own house with her life partner. She has worked selling shellfish for 11 years. She sells it as a street vendor in the different colonies and now has regular customers. With what she earns from her sales, she manages to cover some of the household expenses. She is asking for a loan to purchase more shellfish in bulk to be able to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase shellfish in bulk.

loans.name: Rigo Jose

texts.es:
Rigo es un joven de veinte tres años de edad, lleno de fuerzas para trabajar y salir adelante como agricultor. Desde pequeño su madre y hermanas, le enseñaron a trabajar en el campo en las tierras que poseían, de las cuales hoy en día él es el dueño. Gracias a un primer crédito, logro sacar adelante si primera cosecha de café, porque invirtió el dinero en abono y pesticidas para las plantas. 
Tuvo tan buenas ganancias vendiendo el café, que ha vuelto a sembrarlo, aprovechando el clima frio de esta temporada del año en su pueblo. El confiando plenamente en Kiva y MiCrédito, ha solicitado un préstamo que le brinde la oportunidad de comprar el mejor abono y pesticida para sacar su plantación de café adelante y luego poder ofertarlo a buen precio al mercado.
texts.en: Rigo is a 23 year old young man, full of strength and desire to work and get ahead as a farmer. Since he was a little boy, his mother and sister taught him to work the fields in the land they owned, which he now owns. Thanks to a first loan, he had a successful first coffee harvest because he invested in manure in pesticides for the plants. He had good earnings selling coffee, which he has now planted again taking advantage of the cold climate this year in his home town. He fully trusts Kiva and MiCredito, and is now asking for a loan to buy the best manure and pesticides to help his coffee crop thrive and to offer it at a good price in the market.

loans.use: To buy manure and pesticides.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more cashews in bulk.

loans.name: Francia Elena

texts.es: Francia de 47 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella posee una venta de pupusas desde hace 10 años y con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra salir adelente, ella quiere mejorar su vivienda cambiando puertas y ventas pero como no posee de suficiente capital esta solicitando un credito para la compra de materiales de contruccion y asi poder tener una vivienda digna y segura.
texts.en: Francia, 47 years old, lives in her own house with her family. She has had a pupusa sales business for 10 years and, with what she gets from her sales, she manages to get ahead. She wants to improve her house, replacing the doors and windows, but as she doesn't have enough capital, she is asking for a loan to purchase construction materials and, so, be able to have a dignified and secure house.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials.

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es: Ana de 35 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida y sus tres hijos, ella posee desde hace 5 años una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia, tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios y la amabilidad que tiene a la hora de vender, con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar más sopas, huevos, granos básicos, refrescos, golosinas, pan dulce, etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Ana, 35 years old, lives in her own house with her life partner and their three children. She has had a small store located in the place where she lives for 5 years. She has many customers due to her good prices and the friendliness which she shows while selling. With the earnings that she gets, she manages to cover some of the household expenses. She is asking for a loan to be able to purchase more soups, eggs, basic grains, soft drinks, candies, sweet breads, etc. and, so, to be able to have better income for a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase more soups, eggs, basic grains, soft drinks, candies, sweet breads, etc.

loans.name: Heriberto

texts.es: Heriberto de 47 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus cuatro hijos, el se dedica a la cultivo de maiz desde hace 10 años experiencia que le ha dado la oportunidad de tener una buena cosecha para su venta y asi poder tener buenas ganancias para darle a su familia una buena calidad de vida, el esta solicitando un credito para la compra de abono, herbicidas, pesticidas, etc. y mejorar su terreno para seguir con sus siembras ya que esa es su fuente de trabajo.
texts.en: Heriberto is 47 years old. He lives in his own house with his wife and 4 children. He has worked growing corn for the past 10 years, which has given him the opportunity to have good crops to harvest and good earnings to give his family a good quality of life. He is asking for a loan to buy manure, herbicides, pesticides, etc. and to improve his land to continue growing his crops as this is his sole source of income.

loans.use: To buy manurem herbicides, pesticides, etc. to improve his land.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase seeds, herbicides, fertilizers, manure, pesticides, etc.

loans.name: Yelba Nazarena

texts.es:
Hace cinco años, Yelba tuvo la oportunidad de iniciar con una pulpería debido a un préstamo que otorga el gobierno a mujeres de escasos recursos económicos. Esto la ha motivado a salir adelante como madre soltera de un pequeño de cuatro años de edad. A sus 35 años de edad, ella siente que va por buen camino, por lo que se siente segura para seguir invirtiendo.
