Por esta razón, Yelba solicita un crédito para comprar dulces, snacks, gaseosa, jugos, café, pan, arroz, frijoles, azúcar, entre otros productos nuevos que le permitirán surtir su negocio y agrandarlo. Con esto logrará captar más clientes y cumplir con su sueño de hacer crecer más su pulpería.
texts.en:
Five years ago, Yelba had the opportunity to open a grocery store thanks to a loan granted by the government for women with limited economic resources. As a single mother of a small four-year-old son, this has motivated her to work hard to get ahead. At 35 years old, she feels that she is on the right track and that she is secure enough to continue investing in her business.

For this reason, Yelba is requesting a loan to buy candy, snacks, soda, juices, coffee, bread, rice, beans, sugar, and other new products that will permit her to stock her store and to expand it. This way she will attract more customers and achieve her dream of growing her business.

loans.use: to buy candy, snacks, soda, juices, coffee, bread, rice, beans, sugar, and other new products.

loans.name: Pablo

texts.es: Pablo de 46 años vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus tres hijos, el se dedica a l cultivo de maiz desde hace 28 años, comercializa sus productos en los pueblos aledaños y con las ganancias que obtiene es como puede salir adelante con su familia, el esta solicitando un credito para la compra de abonos, herbicidas, pesticidas, y controles de plagas y asi poder tener una buena cosecha para tener una mejor calidad de vida junto con su familia.
texts.en:
Pablo is 46 and lives in his own home with his wife and three children. He has earned a living growing corn for 28 years and sells his products in surrounding towns. With the profit he makes he is able to support his family.

He is applying for a loan in order to buy fertilizers, herbicides, pesticides and pest control products. This will enable him to have a good harvest and improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, herbicides, pesticides and pest control products.

loans.name: Raul Antonio

texts.es:
Raúl es un hombre de treinta y ocho años de edad, que tiene un buen corazón y  es de carácter trabajador. Desde joven se ha dedicado a ser productor agropecuario, cultiva en su finca, maíz, frijoles y además tiene unas vacas a las cuales ordeña, para luego vender su leche y productos derivados. Gracias a los préstamos que se le han brindado ha logrado ir creciendo como comerciante.
Ha recurrido a un préstamo de Kiva y MiCrédito para invertir en la compra de una vaca de raza especializada en la reproducción, desea hacer crecer su ganado para incrementar la producción de leche y sus derivados, captar nuevos y más clientes. En un futuro desea comprar más terrenos para sembrar maíz.
texts.en:
Raúl is a thirty-eight year old man who has a good heart and a hard-working character. Since he was young, he has worked as an agricultural producer. On his farm, he grows corn, beans and, in addition, he has some cows which he milks to later sell the milk and derived products. Thanks to the loans which have been offered to him, he has managed to grow as a businessman.

He has come for a loan from Kiva and MiCrédito to invest in the purchase of a cow of a breed specialized for reproduction. He wants to grow his cattle to increase the production of milk and derived products, and get new and additional customers. In the future, he wants to purchase more land to grow corn.

loans.use: to purchase a breed of cow specialized for reproduction.

loans.name: Grupo Las Abejas Group

texts.es:
Maria es una mujer de 36 años de edad es soltera con una linda familia por el que se sacrifica día con día para darle a sus hijos lo mejor.
Maria (la primera del lado izquierdo de la fotografía) con esfuerzo y mucho sacrificio trabaja de sol a sol para superarse, ella cuenta que con el apoyo del crédito logro realizar la inversión en su negocio de venta de ropa, afortunadamente le fue muy bien, ya que logro generar una buena ganancias que le permitió mejorar sus condiciones de vida, sin embargo no se está conforme con este avance y su mayor anhelo es seguir prosperando, por ese motivo solicita otro préstamo que lo invertirá nuevamente en la compra y venta de ropa típica.Su gran sueño es construir una casa amplia que sea digna para su familia.
texts.en:
Maria is a 36-year-old woman, single, with a lovely family for whom she sacrifices day by day to give her children the best.

Maria (the first on the left in the photo), with effort and a lot of sacrifice, works from dawn to dusk to improve herself. She says that, with the support of the loan, she managed to make an investment in her business selling clothing. Luckily, it went very well, since she managed to generate good earnings which allowed her to improve her living conditions. However, she doesn't settle for this advance and her greatest desire is to continue prospering, so she asks for another loan which she will invest again in the purchase and sale of traditional clothing. Her greatest dream is to build a large house which is dignified for her family.

loans.use: to purchase and sell traditional clothing.

loans.name: Yahia

texts.en:
Yahia is a 29-year-old, married man from Deir Al-balah, Gaza Strip. He lives with his family in a small, old house where he is the only breadwinner for his family. Yahia woks as a blacksmith in the city. It is a good business and provides him a good income, but the economic situation in the Gaza Strip is bad because of the latest conflict.

Yahia cannot save cash to buy some materials, so he took a USD loan from Palestine for Credit & Development. This loan will help him to buy some iron sheeting for his smithy workshop. He hopes that this new inventory will enable him to increase his sales, customers, and eventually save enough income to cover all his family needs.

loans.use: to buy some iron sheeting for his blacksmith workshop.

loans.name: G. S. La Colonia Group

texts.es:
G.S. LA COLONIA ESTA CONFORMADO POR CUATRO INTEGRANTES, MADRES SOLTERAS CON OCHO HIJOS MENORES DE EDAD, SON ORIGINARIAS DEL SAUCE, SE CARACTERIZAN POR SER TRABAJADORAS, RESPONSABLES, CON GANAS DE SUPERACION PERSONAL,  TODAS TIENE DEFERENTES ACTIVIDADES ECONOMICAS, Y LUCHAN DIA A DIA PARA SACAR ADELANTE SUS NEGOCIOS HACIENDO CRECER, MEJORANDO LA CALIDAD DE SUS PRODUCTOS, Y BRINDANDOLE MEJOR ATENCION AL CLIENTE. Y DE ESA FORMA CUMPLIR SUS METAS Y SUEÑOS COMO BRINDARLES MEJORES OPORTUNIDADES ECONOMICAS A SUS HIJOS, BRINDANDOLES LA EDUCACION QUE NECESITAN, HACIENDO MEJORAS A SU VIVIENDA.
GRACIAS A SUS GANAS DE SUPERACION PERSONAL LA CORDINADORA ES IRAYDA Y TIENE POR ACTIVIDAD ECONOMICA LA VENTA DE COSMETICOS EN SU CASA DE HABITACION Y DE FORMA AMBULANTE, VENDE PRODUCTOS COMO: PERFUMES, CREMAS, BODYS, LABIALES, RUBOR, LAPIZ DE OJOS, CREMAS ANTIOJERAS, MARBELLYNES ETC. ELLA DEDICA A SU NEGOCIO UNAS OCHOS HORAS DIARIAS OFRECIENDO SUS PRODUCTOS, EL OBJETIVO DEL CREDITO ES INVERTIR EN CAPITAL DE TRABAJO Y SURTIR SU NEGOCIO EN LA COMPRA DE PRUCTOS COMESTICOS PARA QUE EN UN FUTURO NO MUY LEJANO PUEDA OBTENER MEJORES INGRESOS. EL G.S. LA COLONIA AGRADECE LA AYUDA QUE LOS INVERSIONISTAS KIVA LE BRINDAN A PERSONAS DE ESCASOS RECURSOS Y PAISES POBRE COMO ES NICARAGUA PARA TENER UN MEDIO DE TRABAJO DIGNO.
texts.en:
The La Colonia solidarity group is made up of four members, single mothers with eight minor children. They are from El Sauce and are characterized as being hard-working, responsible, with the desire to improve themselves. They all have different jobs and struggle day by day to get their businesses ahead, make them grow, improve the quality of their products and offer better customer service, and this is the way they achieve their goals and dreams such as offering new economic opportunities to their children, offering them the education they need, and making improvements to their houses.

Thanks to her desire to improve herself, the coordinator is Irayda and she has as her job selling cosmetics from her house and as a street vendor. She sells products such as perfumes, creams, body lotions, lipsticks, blush, eye lines, eye concealer, and other makeup. She woks at her business some eight hours daily, selling her products. The purpose of the loan is to invest in working capital and stock her business in the purchase of cosmetics so that in the not-so-distant future she can get better income. The La Colonia solidarity group is thankful for the help that the Kiva investors offer to people of limited resources and pour countries such as Nicaragua to have a dignified means of work.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase and sale of cosmetics such as lipstick, blush, eye shadow, body lotions, creams, eye concealer, vanities, etc.

loans.name: Juliana

texts.en:
Juliana is a 48-year-old married mother of two. Ten years ago, she started selling clothes in attempt to help her husband in covering the needs and expenses of their children. She succeeded through out the years to gain her loyal customers and a good reputation among her region.
Juliana is working hard to develop her business, thus today she is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to increase her merchandise with a new collection of fashionable clothes.
Juliana hopes to expand her business more in the future to increase her income and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to increase her merchandise with a new collection of fashionable clothes.

loans.name: Alma

texts.en:
Alma is 44 years old and married with four children, who are still in school, Alma works very hard to provide for them.

Alma runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 4000 loan through NWTF to buy more stocks of groceries to sell like biscuits, breads canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, drinks and other personal care products.

Alma has been in this business for 1 year.

In the future Alma would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of groceries to sell like biscuits, breads canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, drinks and other personal care products

loans.name: Rolita

texts.en:
Rolita is 48 years old and has five children. Rolita is married and has one child still in school.

Rolita is in the agricultural business, raising chickens in the Philippines. Rolita requested a PHP 4000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds, vitamins, vaccine and other supplies to raise her chickens

Rolita has been in this business for 1 year now.

In the future, Rolita would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins, vaccine and other supplies to raise her chickens.

loans.name: Yesu Ni Jibu Group

texts.en:
Viviane (far left in the photo) is one of the members of the Yesu ni Jibu Group from Uvira in Eastern Democratic Republic of Congo. She is 30 years old, married, and lives in a house with her husband. 

Viviane earns a living by selling clothes. Her business model is to purchase a variety of clothing at low prices from the city market and resell them in her town. She has a strong customer base and her customers prefer her because she is friendly. Viviane is ambitious, admirable, and a hard worker who wants to triumph and leave her mark on the world. She is independent, very pragmatic, and considers herself more hardworking than others.

Viviane is requesting a loan of $350 to buy a greater variety of clothing in different colors to boost her earnings. She had success with her previous loan.  All the members of Yesu Ni Jibu Group want to increase their capital and purchase more product to resell.

loans.use: to purchase more clothes for sale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more ingredients such as coconut milk, kerosene, plastic, sugar, rice, eggs, noodles etc. .

loans.name: Rosana

texts.en:
Rosana, 39, is married and has four school-going children. She works very hard to provide for her family.

For the past two years, Rosana has run a general store in the Philippines. She is requesting a PHP 4,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more items to sell. She will purchase items such as canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, drinks, snacks, and bread.

Rosana would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more items to sell, such as canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, drinks, snacks, and bread

loans.name: Mariamu

texts.en:
Mariamu is a single woman with three kids, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that neither has electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family .

Mariamu operates a grocery vegetables selling stall, she sells at the market to town dwellers and neighbors. She faces a challenge of high cost of competition to her place of operation.

With the Kshs 30,000 she wants to purchase crates of tomatoes, green vegetables and onions for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase crates of tomatoes, green vegetables and onions for resale.

loans.name: Manuel Antonio

texts.es:
Manuel es un hombre de treinta y nueve años de edad, que esta entregado a su negocio, a sus cuatro hijos y a su esposa. El posee una tienda en la cual vende CD musicales, anteojos de sol, gorras, entre otras cosas. Gracias a un primer préstamo pudo invertir en algunos equipos de reproducción, que hicieron fortalecer su negocio, él tiene mucha gratitud y confía en Kiva junto a MiCrédito. 
Esta temporada, es muy buena para el negocio de Manuel, por eso él ha solicitado la ayuda de Kiva y MiCredito a través de un préstamo para producir más discos para vender. En un futuro desea expandir su negocio, comprar más televisores y consolas DVDS, además de mejorar la infraestructura. Tiene muchas metas y sueños, que poco a poco las va a cumplir.
texts.en:
Manuel is a thirty-nine year old man who is dedicated to his business, his four children and his wife. He has a store where he sells music CDs, sunglasses and hats, among other things. Thanks to his first loan he was able to invest in some reproduction equipment which strengthened his business. He is very grateful and trusts in Kiva and MiCrédito.

This season is very good for Manuel's business, so he has asked for the help of Kiva and MiCrédito through a loan to make more CDs to sell. In the future, he wants to expand his business, purchase more televisions and DVD consoles in addition to improving the infrastructure. He has many goals and dreams, which little by little he is achieving.

loans.use: to purchase more CDs to sell.

loans.name: Hrach

texts.en:
Hrach is 27 years old and he live with his wife and small daughter in Kapan city of Syunik region. This young farmer has a higher education and a specialty of architecture but he has not managed still to work in his specialty, so he covers his family needs through agricultural activities and some hired work which he manages to have from time to time. On his plot of land Hrach planted beans, potato, tomato, cucumber, peppers, garlic, cabbage and greens. He also has a nice orchard where he has apple, apricot, fig, pear and peach trees. All these harvests Hrach sells at the city’s wholesale market during the week and also these fresh and tasty products they use for their family, which are pure and raised without any fertilizer and pesticides.

Now this loan of 300.000 Armenian drams Harch asks as he needs to change the irrigation pipes in his vegetable garden and he must repair the damaged part of his garden’s fence.

loans.use: to change irrigation pipes of his vegetable garden and he must repair the damaged part of his garden’s fence

loans.name: Oscar

texts.en:
Oscar is an artisan from Peru who specializes in leather home accents. He would like to invest in a bulk purchase of cedar, mohena and tornillo wood, as well as leather, varnish and sealant.
Oscar has been selling through NOVICA since 2004. This is his story:

When Oscar was 10 years old his father died, leaving him no choice but to work at different jobs. One day, when he was 12, he came upon a carpentry shop where he discovered his vocation for working with wood and leather. He resolved to master the craft, and he did so on his own, learning each step and improving every detail. Now Oscar has his own workshop. He sees his work as an art form, not just something to be sold, and his work fills his life in a way he cannot explain.

"I'd like to thank each of you for your support and let you know that I am fully dedicated to crafting a product of the highest quality. I pour my love and time into each piece so that my customers may appreciate the richness of Peruvian craftsmanship."

Use the link below to view Oscar's leather home accents on the NOVICA site:

http://www.novica.com/kiva/4344

loans.use: to invest in a bulk purchase of cedar, mohena and tornillo wood, as well as leather, varnish and sealant

loans.name: Maria Suyapa

texts.es: Maria, tiene 43 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene 3 hijos y reside en una aldea del municipio de Gracias Lempira con sus 3 hijos. En busca de obtener sus propios ingresos, decidió tener su propio negocio para vender harina, azúcar, manteca, jabón, jugos, refrescos, golosinas, y otros. Lleva 4 años de tener el negocio y es su fuente de ingresos para la familia. El prestamo que ha solicitado es el segundo ciclo con la institución y lo va invertir también en la pulpería, con el cual va comprar granos básicos, harina, azúcar, manteca, refrescos, golosinas, productos de limpieza y otros. Considera que al surtir va obtener mejores ganancias. Su plan es, ampliar el negocio con producto nuevo y también el local.
texts.en: Maria is 43 years old, a single mother, has 3 children, and lives in a village of the municipality of Gracias Lempira with her 3 children. In search of getting her own income, she decided to have her own business selling flour, sugar, butter, ham, juice, soft drinks, sweets, and more. She has had this business for 4 years and it is the source of income for her family. The loan that she has asked for is her second loan cycle with the institution and she will invest it also in the store, with which she will purchase basic grains, flour, sugar, butter, soft drinks, sweets, cleaning supplies, and more. She thinks that by stocking up she will get better income. Her plan is to expand her business with new products and a new retail space.

loans.use: to purchase basic grains, flour, sugar, butter, soft drinks, sweets, cleaning products and more.

loans.name: Ramiz

texts.en:
Ramiz is a 24-year-old single man from Deir Al-balah city, which is located in the Gaza Strip and suffers from power outages 12-16 hours a day regularly. He lives with his family in a small house. As an employee in the public sector, he earns a low income. This income barely covers all the family's needs.

Because he is not able to save enough money, Ramiz took a USD loan from FATEN. With this loan, he will buy a solar system for heating water for the family house. Palestinians use water boilers that use either gas or gasoline to heat the water before a shower, which can be dangerous, expensive and inefficient. This will help him to provide hot water without using electricity, which is much more expensive.

loans.use: buy a solar system for heating water for the family house.

loans.name: Ifugenia

texts.en:
Ifugenia is in her early 30s and is married with three children. She has been running several projects such as selling clothes, Tigo pesa, M-pesa, for five years now. She works from 07am to 06pm daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be Ifugenia’s 2nd loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loan to increase on her business stock and has paid back her loan successfully. She is so grateful with the loan and appreciates Kiva for the support of their group. She used the profit to, pay school fees, take care of her family, loan repayment and covered household expenses. She will use this loan to increase on her business stock. She dreams of opening a clothing shop in a busy place at the city center.

Ifugenia will make sure she pays back her loan within the loan schedule time.

loans.use: to increase on her clothing business stock.

loans.name: Calor Satipeño Group

texts.es: Este grupo está emprendiendo su segundo ciclo. La mayoría de los socios se conocen entre sí y son responsables conformada por 06 socias con deseos de progresar. Una de ellas es la Sra Yaneth de 31 años de edad conviviente con dos hijas. Ella se dedica la venta de comida en su propio puesto en el mercado, hace más de 7 años que tiene dicho negocio. Su mayor anhelo es poder mejorar y ampliar su negocio para que pueda tener más clientela. Solicito el crédito para comprar insumos de primera necesidad (arroz, azúcar, aceite y fideos) para la preparación de sus comidas. El grupo “Calor Satipeño” está agradecido con las personas de Kiva que hicieron posible este crédito ya que le permite seguir mejorando la economía de todas las socias. Yaneth es la primera persona que está sentada del lado derecho de la foto.
texts.en: This group is undertaking its second loan cycle. The majority of the members know each other and are responsible. It is made up of 6 members with the desire to progress. One of them is Yaneth, 31 years old, partnered, with two daughters. She works selling food at her own stand in the market, she has had this business for more than 7 years. Her greatest desire is to be able to improve and expand her business so that she can have more customers. She asks for the loan to purchase basic supplies (rice, sugar, oil, noodles) to prepare her food. The "Calor Satipeño" group is grateful to the people of Kiva who made this loan possible since it allows them to continue improving the economic situation of all the members. Yaneth is the first person seated on the right in the photo.

loans.use: to purchase basic supplies (rice, sugar, oil, and noodles).

loans.name: Juvelyn

texts.en:
Juvelyn hails in the town of Sagbayan, Bohol.  She raises pigs for more than 10 years now. 
She is married woman with 3 three children. Her youngest child is 17. Two of her children are still attending school. To augment her income, she also engages in selling copra(coconut meat being dried). 
Her husband has an income that would help defray the family's living condition.

Juvelyn has requested a loan to buy pig feed. With these, she could sustain to feed her pigs until it could be sold for several months. With these she could able to generate higher earnings and able to expand her business  as well. 

She dreams to expand her business to make it productive and profitable.

loans.use: to buy pig feed.

loans.name: Tomorrow Must Be Better - N18Svạnđhải Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Toán is 50 years old and married. She lives in Thanh Hoa, an urban area in Thanh Hoa Province. She is the group leader of "Tomorrow Must Be Better - N18SVạnĐHải", a loan group that consists of five members.

For the past six years, Mrs. Toán has been working in agriculture, raising poultry. Her family is considered a low-income household in her village.  Moreover, her business income is unstable because when poultry diseases kill her chickens she is left with nothing to sell and in financial trouble.

The main hardship that Mrs. Toán faces is the lack of capital. She is requesting a loan to purchase baby poultry to raise and sell in the future. This is Mrs. Toán's first loan with Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution. She hopes that this loan will improve her living standards.

Mrs. Toán aspires to maintain a successful business. She also hopes that her children will find good jobs and her family is healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase baby poultry to raise and sell in the future

loans.name: Ofelia

texts.es:
Ofelia es una mujer de cincuenta y un años de edad, que ama a los animales,  ella logro combinar su pasión con su trabajo, poniendo un negocio de cuido y engorde de cerdos,  es decir una especie de criadero de cerdos que luego vende en algunas temporadas del año. 
Ha recurrido a un préstamo de Kiva junto a MiCrédito, con el que planea comprar vitaminas, comida, vacunas para los cerdos,también invertir en la compra de cerdos de raza, que estén recién nacidos. En futuro ella desea incursionar en otros negocios, además está ahorrando para mejorar la infraestructura de hogar.
texts.en:
Ofelia is a fifty-one year old woman who loves animals. She managed to combine her passion with her work, establishing a business of breeding and fattening pigs, which is to say a type of breeding center for pigs which she then sells during some seasons of the year.

She has come for a loan from Kiva with MiCrédito, with which she plans to purchase vitamins, feed, and vaccine for pigs and also to invest in the purchase of purebred pigs, recently born. In the future, she wants to get into other businesses and in addition she is saving up to improve the infrastructure of her home.

loans.use: to purchase vitamins, feed, and vaccines for the pigs, and also to invest in the purchase of purebred pigs.

loans.name: Maria Luisa

texts.es:
María es una mujer que todos los días, en compañía de sus cinco hijos, empieza a trabajar desde temprano en la producción de tortillas y otros productos derivados del maíz. Para luego ofertarlos de forma ambulante en toda su ciudad. Ella ha logrado crecer gracias a la ayuda de varios créditos por parte de MiCrédito junto a Kiva; está muy agradecida y ha depositado toda su confianza en ambas organizaciones. 
Ha vuelto a recurrir a un préstamo de Kiva junto a MiCrédito, para invertirlo en la compra de sacos de maíz, cal, verduras y otros productos que usa como materia prima. En un futuro desea poder mejorar la infraestructura de su local para montar una comideria. Su motor para trabajar duro es mejorar la calidad de vida de sus hijos, para sacarlos adelante y tengan las oportunidades que ella no tuvo.
texts.en:
María is a woman who every day, in the company of her five children, begins to work early making tortillas and other products from corn to later sell them as a street vendor all over the city. She has managed to grow, thanks to the help of several loans from MiCrédito with Kiva. She is very grateful and has put all her confidence in the two organizations.

She has again asked for a loan from Kiva with MiCrédito, to invest it in the purchase of sacks of corn, lime powder, vegetables, and other products which she uses as raw material. In the future she wants to be able to improve the infrastructure of her retail space to establish an eatery. Her drive to work hard each day is to improve her children's quality of life, to get them ahead and that they have opportunities that she didn't have.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of corn, lime powder, vegetables, and other products which she uses as raw material.

loans.name: Kristine Joy

texts.en:
As a single parent of one child, Kristine joy works hard to support her family.

She has a vegetable vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from rice retailing.  Kristine joy is borrowing PHP 4000 through NWTF to buy more vegetable such as eggplant, sweet potato, tomato, squash and spices to sell to her stall.

She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more vegetable such as eggplant, sweet potato, tomato, squash and spices to sell to her stall

loans.name: Lilia

texts.en:
Lilia is 62 years old and married with eight children. Lilia works very hard to provide for them.

Lilia runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 4000 loan through NWTF to buy more stocks of groceries to sell like biscuits, breads canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, drinks and other personal care products.

Lilia has been in this business for 3 years. 

In the future Lilia would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of groceries to sell like biscuits, breads canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, drinks and other personal care products

loans.name: Chreb's Group

texts.en:
Chreb is aged 32, living in a rural area of Kratie province and she is a mother of two small children, one of whom is in school while the other one is too young for school. Growing cassava and working as a paid worker are the sources of her family’s income for seven years. Recently, the cassava’s price in the market has decreased, which causes her to earn a lower income than before and it is really hard for her to support her family.

She is now forming as a group of five members to take a Kiva loan via VisionFund and this is the first loan cycle for her. As the group leader, she is willing to use her loan portion to buy pesticide to protect her crop from being destroyed by insects. She hopes her cassava will grow healthily and able her to sell it in a higher price.

loans.use: to buy pesticide to protect her crop from being destroyed by insects and enable her to sell it in a higher price. .

loans.name: Mandzaano 3 Group

texts.en:
The group, Mandzaano 3 is in ninth loan cycle with ID-Ghana. They are fighting and striving to be able to improve their living conditions and those of their family. They are into clothing, scarves, smoked fish and underwear.

One of the members, Comfort, has been selling scarves and wax-prints for 26 years. She is a very hard working businesswoman, which is why she is doing very well, and already has many customers. Comfort is a courageous and unselfish woman who wants to get ahead, so she became part of this micro-finance in order to be able to grow.

She is requesting this loan so that she can purchase more clothing and scarves which she will sell from door-to-door to her customers. She said that moving door-to-door makes it possible for her to know where her customers recite and also make new customers. This effort gives her quick sales and makes more profit. She is grateful to receive the opportunity to be able to continue helping her loved ones.

loans.use: to purchase more clothing and scarves which she will sell from door-to-door to her customers.

loans.name: Ra'nokhon

texts.ru: Эту милую и очаровательную девушку зовут Раънохон. Ей 25 лет. Она замужем. Ее муж работает заграницей, так как не смог найти работу на Родине. Раънохон тоже не сидит без дела. Она работает продавщицей на рынке. Она продает детскую одежду. Она старается успевать работать и следить за двумья маленькими детьми. Смотреть за детьми ей помогает ее отец. Сейчас ее отцу становится тяжелее смотреть за детьми и у него ухудшается здоровье. Раънохон хочет помочь отцу. Для реабилитации отца нужны деньги и Раънохон видит выход из ситуации в получения кредита. Она надеется, что сможет получить кредит и ее отец скоро получить медицинскую помощь.
texts.en:
This nice, charming young woman is called Ra'nokhon. She is 25 and married. Her husband works abroad since he couldn't find work in their home country. Ra'nokhon doesn't sit idle either - she works selling children's clothing at the market. She tries to be successful in her work and in taking care of her two small children. Her father helps her with the latter, but it has become harder for him as his health is getting worse.

Ra'nokhon wants to help her father. He needs money for the treatment and she sees borrowing money as a way out of this situation. She hopes that she will be able to receive a loan and that her father will soon receive medical assistance.

loans.use: to pay for her father's medical treatment

loans.name: Bassam

texts.en:
Bassam is a 43-year-old, married father of three children. Since 1996, he has been employed in a laboratory of dental equipment. His wife is unemployed which makes him the exclusive financial provider of the family. His three children are in private schools, which means that he has to pay the tuition fees on top of the family expenses for food and other necessities, while his income is barely enough to provide for all these expenses. 
Today, Bassam is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to pay his children's school tuition fees. This would be greatly beneficial because it would alleviate the burden of the expenses and would help him provide a better life for his family.

loans.use: to pay his children's school tuition fees

loans.name: Aida Milagro

texts.es: Aida de 40 años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa propia con su hija, ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de tortillas y a la crianza de cerdos, tiene 20 años de dedicarse a esa actividad, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella está solicitando nuevamente un crédito para la compra de maíz por mayor y cal para seguir con la venta de sus tortillas y así poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Aida, 40 years old, is a single mother. She lives in her own house with her daughter and works making and selling tortillas and raising pigs. She has been doing this work for 20 years; with what she gets from her work she manages to cover some household expenses. She is asking for another loan to purchase corn in bulk and lime powder to continue with the sales of her tortillas and, so, to be able to have better income.

loans.use: to purchase corn in bulk and lime powder.

loans.name: Edwin Omar

texts.es: Edwin, tiene 31 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposa con quien tiene un hijo y reside en el Municipio de Nueva Frontera, Santa Barbara. El se ha dedicado a la agricultura y hace 5 meses inició su nuevo negocio de venta de medicinas comunes, como pastillas, analgésicos, expectorantes, anti diarreicos, vitaminas e inyecciones.  Esta actividad la realiza de forma ambulante ofreciendo en varias comunidades. Ha solicitado un prestamo por 8,000 Lempiras para invertirlo en compra de mas producto de medicinas como ser: pastillas analgésicos, expectorantes, inyecciones, antidiarreicos, espasmódicos y vitaminas, con el fin de aumentar las ventas. Tiene como meta hacer crecer el negocio para salir adelante y darle mejor forma de vida a su familia. Edwin tiene muchos deseos de superación con su familia y su negocio.
texts.en: Edwin is 31 years old, is in a common-law marriage with his wife, with whom he has one child, and lives in the municipality of Nueva Frontera, Santa Barbara. He has worked in agriculture and 5 months ago, he began his new business selling common medicines such as pills, painkillers, expectorants, antidiarrheals, vitamins and injections. He does this work as a street vendor, selling in various communities. He has asked for a loan of 8,000 lempiras to invest it in the purchase of more medicine products such as painkilling pills, expectorants, injections, antidiarrheals, cramp medicines, and vitamins, with the end of increasing his sales. He has as his goal to grow his business to get ahead and give his family a better standard of living. Edwin has a lot of desire to improve himself with his family and his business.

loans.use: to purchase more medicines such as painkillers, expectorants, injections, antidiarrheal medicines, cramp medicines and vitamins.

loans.name: Alwar Cmt Group

texts.fr: Le banc villageois dont fait partie ce groupe a été inauguré le 11 juillet 2002. C'est un groupe est constitué de dix femmes dynamiques. Madame Véronique qui est à la droite de la photo levant la main est la représentante du groupe. Elle est âgée de 39 enfants et mère de quatre filles. Elle est divorcée. Elle s'active depuis deux ans dans l'aviculture. avec le crédit reçu elle va acheter des poussins, de l’aliment et des vaccins. Elle est la seule dans sa localité à développer cette activité. les bénéfices générés par son activité vont lui servir à prendre en charge de ses enfants.
texts.en:
The village loan association of which this group is a part was inaugurated on July 11, 2002. It's a group made up of 10 dynamic women. Madame Véronique who is on the right in the photo, raising her hand, is the representative of this group. She is 39 and the mother of four daughters. She is divorced.

Mme Véronique has been working for two years in poultry raising. With the loan she will buy chicks, feed for them, and vaccines. She is the only one in her area to develop this business. The profit raised by her business will help her cover the needs of her children.

loans.use: to buy chicks to raise, feed for them, and vaccines.

loans.name: Ulises

texts.es: Ulises de 36 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y su hijo, el se dedica al cultivo de maiz y tambien a la crianza de ganado desde hace 15 años, e inicio con capital propio, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el esta solicitando un credito para la compra de abono, pesticidas, fertilizantes, etc. para poder tener una buena cosecha y asi tener mejores ingresos economicos.
texts.en: Ulises, who is 36 years old, lives in a house he owns with his wife and his son. He has worked in corn farming and also breeding livestock for 15 years. He started with his own capital. With what he gets from his sales he manages to settle some household expenses. He is asking for a loan to buy manure, pesticides, fertilizers, etc., to be able to have a good harvest and therefore have a better economic income.

loans.use: to buy manure, pesticides, fertilizers, etc.

loans.name: Judy

texts.en:
Judy is 50 years old and married. She has seven children, three of whom are enrolled in school.

Judy is in the agricultural business, duck raising in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy feeds and vitamins for her ducks.

Judy has been raising ducks for four years now and has borrowed from NWTF six times in the past to sustain her business.

In the future, Judy would like to save enough money to continue sending her children to school.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her ducks.

loans.name: Maria Amparo

texts.es: María, tiene 43 años de edad, cuenta con el apoyo y compañía de su conyugue, tiene 4 hijos y reside en una aldea que pertenece al municipio de Gracias, Lempira. María siempre se ha dedicado a realizar actividades agrícolas cultivando maíz y frijoles, tambien hace 6 años se dedico a cultivar café y vende su producción en oro o entero.  Esta actividad que realiza es su fuente de ingreso familiar y se está  esmerando por mejorarla. Actualmente solicita otro préstamo por 7,000 Lempiras, para invertirlo en el cultivo de maíz y frijol, con el cual va comprar fertilizantes para aplicarle a la parcela actual y a una nueva que va sembrar. Su plan es brindar buena asistencia para sacar mejor producción y obtener más ingresos para que sus hijos continúen estudiando.
texts.en:
Maria is 43 years old. She has the support of her spouse, she has 4 children, and she lives in a village that belongs to the municipality of Gracias, Lempira. Maria has always worked in agricultural occupations, farming corn and beans. Six years ago she also worked farming coffee and she sold her production in green beans or whole.  
This occupation is her source of family income and she is making great efforts to improve it. Currently she is asking for a loan for 7,000 lempiras, to invest in the farming of corn and beans. She will buy fertilizer to apply to the plot of land she has and to a new one she is going to sow. 
Her plan is to bring good help so she can get better production and obtain more income, so that her children can keep studying.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers to apply to the plot of land where she will sow corn and beans.

loans.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es: Maria de 44 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, ella se dedica a la venta de antojitos (baleadas de quesillo, chilaquilas, etc.) su negocio esta ubicado cerca de su casa en una zona muy transitada por esa razon posee muchos clientes, con las ventas que realiza logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella esta solicitando un credito para la compra de harina, pollos, quesillo, vegetales, aceite, etc. para poder seguir con sus ventas y asi poder obtener mejores ingresos economicos.
texts.en: Maria, who is 44 years old, lives with her husband in a house she owns. She works in the sale of traditional corn based dishes (baleadas,  flour tortilla folded in half with refried beans, cheese and cream; chilaquiles, cut, lightly fried corn tortillas, etc.). Her business is located close to her home in a very circulated area. Because of this, she has many clients. With the sales she makes she manages to settle some of her household expenses. She is asking for a loan to buy flour, chickens, cheese, vegetables, oil, etc., to be able to continue with her sales and be able to obtain a better economic income.

loans.use: to buy flour, chickens, cheese, vegetables, oil, etc.

loans.name: Jose Manuel

texts.es:
Jose es un hombre de treinta y siete años de edad, muy esforzado, honesto y trabajador, tiene once años en el negocio de compra y venta de plátanos, gracias a múltiples créditos ha logrado pasar de vender en carretón a adquirir un camión que le ha permito captar más clientes y sacar adelante a sus cuatros hijos y esposa. 
Él ha solicitado un préstamo de Kiva junto a MiCrédito, para poder comprar plátanos en una gran cantidad, lo que permitiría abastecer a más mercados y le generaría un crecimiento como comerciante. En un futuro el desea recibir un financiamiento que le permita comprar un terreno y así poder sembrar los platanos, no solo comprar y venderlos.
texts.en:
Jose is a 37-year-old man, he makes a lot of effort and he is honest and hardworking. He has worked eleven years in the business of buying and selling bananas. Thanks to multiple loans, he has managed to go from selling in a cart to getting a truck, which has allowed him to get more clients and help his wife and four children get ahead.
He has asked for a loan from Kiva together with MiCredito, to be able to buy bananas in large amounts, which will allow him to supply more markets and would generate growth as a retailer. In the future, he wants to receive financing which will allow him to buy a plot of land and be able to sow bananas, not only buy and sell them.

loans.use: to buy bananas in large amounts.

loans.name: Raul

texts.en: Raul lives in Suai, and most of his daily income is from his workshop. He is now applying for a loan of $800 from Tuba Rai Metin which he will use to buy motorcycle spare parts, tools, and other materials to use in his workshop. He started this business in 2011 with his own working capital of $ 500. He is happy with the loan offered to him, because he can improve his business.

loans.use: to buy motorcycle spare parts, tools, and other materials to use in his workshop.

loans.name: Rubilyn

texts.en:
Rubilyn is a 37-year-old married woman with five children, four of whom are in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur who has an abaca weaving business in the Philippines.

She has requested a PHP 12,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy abaca fiber and other materials needed in her business.

Rubilyn has been in this business for seven years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy abaca fiber and other materials needed in her business

loans.name: Mercedes Aracelly

texts.es:
Mercedes se alista todos los sábados, desde muy temprano, para dar un paso más para convertirse en Licencia en Contaduría Pública. Esta joven de 25 años de edad, se vio atraída por la alta demanda laboral que hay en esta área, además que lo miró como una oportunidad de seguir poniendo en práctica su habilidad con los números. Ahora ella está en quinto año de la carrera y cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo, quien es agricultor. 
Por otro lado, Mercedes ha sido muy afortunada, pues siempre tiene el apoyo moral y económico de su familia, mediante las remeses que le mandan. Sentirse respaldada, le ha permitido tomar la decisión de solicitar un préstamo para pagar su curso de titulación y para comprar una computadora, ambas herramientas necesarias para poder obtener su título universitario. En sus planes está buscar un empleo acorde a lo estudiado y así ayudar económicamente a su familia.
texts.en:
Mercedes gets ready every Saturday, very early in the morning, to take another step to become a graduate in Public Accounting. This young woman who is 25 years old became attracted by the high demand that there is in this area. She also looked at it as an opportunity to continue putting her ability with numbers into practice. Now she is in the fifth year of her degree, and she has the support of her husband, who is a farmer. 
Mercedes has always been very fortunate, because she has always had the moral and economic support of her family, through the money that they send her from abroad. To feel this support has allowed her to take the decision to ask for a loan to pay for her degree course and to buy a computer, both necessary tools to be able to get her university degree. Her plans is to look for a job related to her studies and in this way help her family economically.

loans.use: to pay for her degree course and to buy a computer.

loans.name: Elisabeth

texts.fr:
Elisabeth est une femme travailleuse et dynamique de 48 ans. Elle est mariée et mère d'un enfant de 16 ans et qui est en classe de seconde en ce moment.
Elle dirige un petit stand d'alimentation depuis 1999. Elle voudrait développer et étendre son activité. Son désir est que celle-ci devienne un restaurant un jour.
Elle a pu acquérir avec les bénéfices de cette activité et ses efforts personnels un terrain de bon emplacement sur lequel elle projette de bâtir sa propre maison.
texts.en:
Elisabeth is a hard-working and dynamic woman of 48. She is married and the mother of a 16-year-old who is presently in the second year of high school.

She has been running a little food stand since 1999. She would like to develop and expand her business. Her wish is to have it become a restaurant, someday.

With the profit from this business and her personal effort, she has managed to acquire a well-located piece of land on which she plans to build her own house.

loans.use: to buy rice, flour, other ingredients, vegetables, meat, and fresh fruit.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is a single woman with one child. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Jocelyn is 42 years old and her child is still in school.

Jocelyn has a tailoring business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 4,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy materials like cloth, needles, thread and for the maintenance of her business.

Jocelyn has been in this business for 8 years. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy materials like cloth, needles, thread and for the maintenance of her business

loans.name: Elsie

texts.en:
Elsie is 49 years old, married, and has four children. Presently, two children are in school.  She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Elsie has a food vending business in the Philippines. Elsie requested a 4,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients like meat, fish, spices, and additional utensils for her food production business.

Elsie has been in this business for 5 years. She would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like meat, fish, spices, and additional utensils for her food production business

loans.name: Laida

texts.en:
Laida is 52 years old, married, and has four children.

She is in the agricultural business of pig fattening in the Philippines. Laida is borrowing 4,000 PHP through NWTF to buy feed, vitamins, vaccines, and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Laida has been in this business for 3 years, and also earns additional income from buying and selling frozen foods.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, vaccines, and other supplies to raise her pigs

loans.name: Alwar Cmt Group

texts.fr: Le banc villageois a été inauguré le 11 juillet 2002. Ce groupe est constitué de sept femmes courageuses qui font le commerce comme activité. Madame Awa qui est à la droite de la photo levant la main est la représentante du groupe. Elle est mariée, âgée de 48 ans et mère de quatre enfants dont deux filles. Elle s'active dans la vente de l'huile de palme, du jus de citron et du nèttétou depuis plus de dix années. Elle va acheter deux bidons de vingt litres d'huile de palme et cinq bidons de dix litres de jus de citron. Elle satisfait sa clientèle et a constamment de stock de produit. Les bénéfices vont servir à soutenir ses enfants et à aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
This loan group was inaugurated on July 11, 2002. This group is made up of seven courageous women who all have businesses in small-scale commerce. Madame Awa who is on the right in the photo, raising her hand, is the representative of the group. She is married, aged 48, and the mother of four children, two of them girls.

Madame Awa has been selling palm oil, lemon juice, and nèttétou (spicy seasoning) for more than 10 years. She is going to buy two jerrycans of 20 liters each of palm oil and five containers of 10 liters of lemon juice. She meets the needs of her clientele and constantly has enough of her products on hand. The profits will allow her to support her children and help her husband with the expenses.

loans.use: to buy palm oil, lemon juice, and nettetou (spicy seasoning made from a seed).

loans.name: Kimverly

texts.en:
Kimverly is 23 years old, married, and has two children; both children are presently in school.  Kimverly works very hard to provide for them.

Kimverly runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 4,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy grocery items to sell such as canned goods, shampoo, soap, milk, bread, spices, etc.

Kimverly has been in this business for 1 year.

She would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy  grocery items to sell such as canned goods, shampoo, soap, milk, bread, spices, etc

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.en:
Marcelina is 32 years, and she is married. She has a kiosk to generate income for her family. 

She wants to expand her business, but she does not have enough working capital. She felt better when she applied for her first loan, and she is applying for her second loan of $1.000.00 USD. 

She will buy some additional supplies to keep in her store such as biscuits, beer, Fanta, Coca-Cola, Sprite, Sagiko, water, slippers, oils, body lotion, soap, candles, and books. 

She is happy with TRM (TubaRaiMetin) that offers loan to poor people.

loans.use: to buy biscuits, beer, Fanta, Coca-Cola, Sprite, Sagiko, water, slippers, oils, body lotion, soap, candles, and books

loans.name: Sheena

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Sheena works hard to support her family.

She has a dried fish vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from fattening pigs. Sheena is borrowing PHP 22,000 through NWTF to buy more dried fish to sell for her dried fish vending business.

Sheena has been sustaining her business activities through her past eight loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to to earn money for the education of her children and improve her business.

loans.use: to buy more dried fish to sell.

loans.name: Josie

texts.en:
Josie is 32 years old, married, and has one child. Josie works very hard to provide for her family.

Josie runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 4,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, soap, toothpaste, noodles, and other grocery items.

Josie has been in this business for 1 year.

She would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, soap, toothpaste, noodles, and other grocery items

loans.name: Hariliva Nicolas

texts.fr:
Nicolas est un père de famille travailleur, très fier de sa famille. Il a 62 ans. Il est marié, et ils ont trois filles. Ces dernières sont toutes déjà mariées et ne sont plus à sa charge.
Sa femme est marchande de fruits et légumes et lui, il exerce une activité d'élevage de porc. Son âge n'est pas un blocage pour lui de continuer à travailler. Au contraire, selon lui, ça l'aide beaucoup à garder une bonne forme. Il considère son activité comme à la fois son travail et aussi son distraction. C'est un être qui a de la joie de vivre et qui a de la conviction.
A son âge, il a encore l'ambition de développer son activité. pour pouvoir préparer un retraite solide et surtout pour laisser un bon héritage à ses trois filles selon lui.
texts.en:
Nicolas is a hard-working man who is very proud of his family. He is sixty-two years old, married and has three daughters. All of his daughters are now married and no longer his financial responsibility. His wife sells fruit and vegetables and he raises pigs. Despite his age he is able to continue working and believes he is strong because of his age. He works to earn a living but also because he enjoys it.

Nicolas is full of the joys of life and is still an ambitious man. He wants to expand his business so he can prepare for a comfortable retirement and, above all, leave something to his three daughters.

loans.use: to buy raw materials to make pig feed and to buy pig feed.

loans.name: Bakoly Florence

texts.fr:
Bakoly Florence est une jeune femme dynamique et débrouillarde de 23 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de deux petits adorables enfants. Son époux vend quelques marchandises générales à côté de son lieu de vente et elle vend des chaussures à l'occasion et des vêtements fripes, comme nous pouvons voir sur sa photo. Il y a maintenant trois ans qu'elle commençait à exercer cette activité.
Les deux époux se soutiennent bien mutuellement dans l'exercice de leurs activités pour le bien de la famille. La preuve en est qu'en ce moment, la construction de leur propre maison est en cours. C'est une femme très travailleuse qui a de l'ambition d'avancer et de lutter dans la vie.
texts.en:
Bakoly Florence is twenty-three years old and a dynamic, resourceful woman. She is married and has two lovely, little children. Her husband sells generals items from a site near where she has been selling second-hand clothing and shoes for three years now. This can be seen in the photo. Husband and wife support one another in their businesses to the benefit of their family. This is demonstrated by the fact that they are currently building a new home.

Bakoly Florence is very hard-working and would like to do well in life.

loans.use: to buy one mixed bag of shoes and two bags of children's shoes.

loans.name: Miriam Estela

texts.es: Doña Miriam de 55 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hija, ella se dedica desde hace varios años a la elaboración y venta de tortillas, su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia y tiene muchos clientes, gracias a su trabajo es como logra salir adelante con su familia, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de maíz por quintales y cal para poder continuar con la elaboración de las tortillas y así poder tener mejores ingresos para tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Miriam is 55 years old and lives in her own home along with her husband and daughter. Miriam has earned a living making and selling tortillas for several years. Her business is located in her home and she has many customers. Thanks to her business, she is able to help her family move forward.

Miriam is requesting this loan in order to buy corn in bulk and lime so that she is able to continue making tortillas. This will allow her to increase her income and have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn in bulk and lime.

loans.name: Clever Women - N10Ttqlào Group

texts.en:
Mrs Liên is 29 years old, and she is married. She has been a tailor for 4 years.  Liên lives in Yen Dinh district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

Her family is a low-income household in the village. The market need is low in this region, and the income from this business is unstable because there are many shops selling diversified clothes with competitive prices.  She has to make sure that her products are unique enough to attract clients.  The main hardship that Liên faces is lack of capital. She is requesting a loan to purchase machines and materials to expand her business.

In 2014, Liên joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her business. Liên has successfully repaid 2 loans from Thanh Hoa microfinance institution.

She is the group leader of Clever women - N10TTQLào, which consists of 4 members.

With her business profits, Liên hopes to make enough money to provide for her kids, to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase machines and materials to expand her business

loans.name: Hilda

texts.en:
Hilda patiently manages her hog raising business, because she wants to help her husband provide for their family's needs. Her husband works as a security guard. Hilda’s husband's wage serve to provide for their four children's needs. For her, it is challenging to manage a small budget for so many needs. Sometimes her husband's salary is not enough to sustain their needs, and her income from hog raising helps them. Thus, she is asking for a loan of 15,000 PHP to buy piglets to raise and feed for their sustenance. 

Hilda wishes to raise her hogs properly and gain income from it in order to provide a good education for her children.

loans.use: to buy piglets to raise and feed for their sustenance

loans.name: Ethelinda

texts.en:
Ethelinda is 63 years old. She is known in the Siare, Sindangan, Zamboanga del Norte area for her buying and selling business. She is actively participating in the various programs and services that the co-op offers.

She hopes to live comfortably, with a decent house, for which she applied for a loan to purchase plywood, nails, and sticks. She hopes to maintain her membership in good standing, with a good repayment record.

It matters that she has been given a priority, as a microfinance member of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC). This is what she is thankful for, when all her financing needs of her buying and selling business are supported by PMPC.

loans.use: to purchase plywood, nails, and sticks for her house.

loans.name: Elena

texts.en:
Elena is managing her eatery business in Sindangan, Zamboanga del Norte. She mastered the business when she and her husband were in the early years of their marriage. This has been doing well, supporting the needs of the family.

She has local customers and also accepts catering for added income.

Recently, she borrowed an amount to purchase more kilos of meat and spices for her eatery business. She wants to expand her business and would be more than happy to open a small canteen at a nearby school.

loans.use: to purchase more kilos of meat and spices for her eatery business

loans.name: Gil Bernanrdo

texts.es:
Las computadoras y sus sistemas son el fuerte de Gil, un joven de 25 años de edad, quien estudio Ingeniería en Sistemas, puesto que siempre se vio atraído por la tecnología y sus funciones en la actualidad. Anteriormente, él había solicitado un préstamo para pagar sus últimas clases de la carrera y su título, inversión que valió la pena puesto que ahora es oficialmente un ingeniero en sistemas y trabaja reparando computadoras. Por lo que desea agradecer a todas las personas que le apoyaron en el último crédito que ayudó a cumplir con esa etapa. 
No obstante, también se mira yendo más lejos con su aprendizaje, razón por la cual este emprendedor decidió solicitar un nuevo préstamo para pagar una Especialización en Base de Datos y así poder aprender lo último, diversificar sus servicios y optar por un trabajo en una empresa privada. Además de recibir el apoyo familia, recibe remesas que le han ayudado a salir adelante. En sus planes también está hacer una maestría en Tecnología de la información.
texts.en:
Computers and programming are Gil's forte. He is 25 years old and studied programming as he was always attracted to technology and the things it can do. Previously he applied for a loan to pay for his final undergraduate modules and his degree certificate, This was a worthwhile investment as he is now a programming engineer who works repairing computers. Gil is grateful for all those who supported this last loan that helped him to complete this stage of his life.

Nonetheless, Gil is looking to advance his learning and so this entrepreneur has decided to apply for a loan in order to pay for studies specialising in computer databases and learn the most up-to-date skills, diversify his services and find a job in the private sector. As well as support from his family, Gil receives help from abroad. Amongst his future plans, Gil wants to do a Master's in information technology.

loans.use: to pay for studies specialising in computer databases.

loans.name: Remegia

texts.en:
Remegia is 63 years old and residing at Disud, Sindangan, Zamboanga del Norte. She is married and blessed with children of adult age.

She joined PMPC in order to access the programs and services of the said co-op. Recently, she's accessing her eighth loan in the amount of PHP 30,000 for additional working capital for her existing business to buy dry goods, shampoo, soap, drinks, and canned goods.

loans.use: to buy dry goods, shampoo, soap, drinks, and canned goods.

location.town: Sindangan - Disud, Sindangan, Zamboanga del Norte

loans.name: Hanou

texts.fr: Mère d’un enfant, Hanou est une femme mariée qui habite à Baguida. Agée de 52 ans, Hanou est une revendeuse de sachets en plastique qui s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché et le revend de quartier en quartier. Hanou demande ce prêt pour commander des caisses de sachets de cinq francs, de glaçon et de jus. Avec le bénéfice qui en résultera, Hanou va pour aider son mari à bien occuper de leur enfant dans son éducation scolaire.
texts.en:
Hanou is fifty-two years old, married and mother to one child. She lives in Baguida and sells plastic bags. She buys her stock twice a month from the market and sells it on foot in surrounding neighbourhoods.

Hanou has requested this loan to order boxes of five franc bags, ice and juice. With her profits, Hanou will help her husband take care of their child and pay for education.

loans.use: to buy 4 boxes of plastic bags, 4 boxes of bags of ice and 2 boxes of bags of juice.

loans.name: Afi

texts.fr: Veuve et mère de trois enfants, Afi est une femme âgée de 36 ans résidant à Baguiuda. Afi est une marchande  de produits alimentaires qui s’approvisionne de ses marchandises deux fois par mois au marché et les revendent à la devanture de son domicile. Afi sollicite ce prêt pour commander des paniers des oignons et de piments sec rouge en vue d’avoir un stock important et maximiser son profit afin d’aider son mari dans l’éducation de ses enfants et à subvenir aux charges quotidiennes éprouvées par sa famille.
texts.en:
Afi is thirty-six years old, a widow and mother to three children. She lives in Baguida and sells food products. She buys her stock twice a month from the market and sells it from the front of her house.

Afi has requested this loan to order baskets of onions and dried, red chillies. This will increase her stock holding and maximise her profit. She would like to contribute more to the education of her children and the day-to-day expenses of her family.

loans.use: to buy 8 baskets of onions and 6 baskets of dried red chillies.

loans.name: Rosemer

texts.en:
Rosemer landed at a right place for her needed capital when she joined PMPC. She knew this would be her last chance to get back on her feet when she went broke after her first business went bad. PMPC came to the rescue and lent her money when she needed it the most. Now, she has requested another loan for the next cropping season. 

The loan will be used to pay for land and seedbed preparation.  Rosemer perseveres and always stays positive to reach her goals in order to continuously provide for her family.

loans.use: to pay for land and seedbed preparation

loans.name: Mailan

texts.en:
Mailan has always had the enthusiasm for farming. She cultivates rice in Lagag, Sindangan, Zamboanga del Norte, and has yielded good earnings doing this type of work. 

Recently, she applied for a loan to pay for land and seedbed preparations. This will ensure that the rice field is ready for planting. Mailan knows that she has to get things right in order to yield more income for this cropping season. 

In the future, Mailan hopes to buy a hauling truck for easy transport of her produce.

loans.use: to pay for land and seedbed preparations

location.town: SINDANGAN - LAGAG, SINDANGAN, ZAMBOANGA DEL NORTE

loans.name: Angelico

texts.en:
Angelico is 50 years old and lives in Delusom, Leon B. Postigo. He is married with children of adult age.

Angelico has been engaged in managing a car radiator repair shop for 15 years already and earns approximately PHP 4,000 each month doing this type of business activity.

He has requested a loan to be used in purchasing additional bronze rods, flux, copper and other accessories and materials for his radiator repair shop business.

Angelico has been a member of PMPC for eight years. In the future, Angelico hopes to expand the radiator repair shop business.

loans.use: to purchase additional bronze rods, flux, copper and other accessories and materials.

loans.name: Akossiwa

texts.fr: Akossiwa est une femme mariée résidant à Baguida avec deux enfants à charge. Akossiwa est une revendeuse de charbon de bois qui s’approvisionne trois fois par mois au marché et le revend à la devanture de son domicile. Pour financer son achat, Akossiwa nécessite ce prêt pour commander des sacs de charbon de bois afin de réaliser plus de bénéfice et soutenir son mari dans les charges de la famille puis permettre une bonne éducation à leurs enfants.
texts.en:
Akossiwa is married and is responsible for two children. She lives in Baguida and sells charcoal. She buys her stock three times a month from the market and sells it from the front of her home.

Akossiwa has requested this loan to order sacks of charcoal, increase her profits and help her husband provide for the expenses of their family and a good education for their children.

loans.use: to buy 4 sacks of charcoal.

loans.name: Francisco Ramon

texts.es:
En las calles de la ciudad colonial, anda corriendo una camioneta azul que todo el tiempo está llena de productos, muebles y materiales que le dan a transportar Francisco, un emprendedor de 56 años de edad, quien desde hace trece años, se dedica a ofrecer el servicio de transporte. Con tres hijos, dos de ellos independientes, pero la menor todavía yendo a la universidad con grandes visiones del mundo profesional, y una esposa que lo apoya al cien por ciento, se siente seguro haciendo bien su trabajo. 
 Francisco siempre ha soñado con obtener más clientes y extender su servicio, por lo que solicita un préstamo para mejorar su camioneta, llevarla al taller a que reparen los frenos, el aceite, la carrocería y las llantas, de manera que cuando ya esté lista, pueda ofrecer un mejor servicio. En sus otros planes está comprar otra camioneta más adelante, lo que le permitirá captar más clientes y tener más ingresos para seguir apoyando a su hija menor.
texts.en:
Along the streets of the colonial city of Granada, 56-year old entrepreneur Francisco drives his blue truck, all the time filled with products, furniture and material that he transports. He has been working providing transport services for three years. Francisco has three children, two now independent and the third at university and with big plans for the professional world, He also has a wife, who supports him 100%; overall Francisco feels safe when he does his job well.

Francisco has always wanted to have more customers and expand his offer of services. He is therefore applying for a loan in order to make improvements to his truck, and to take to the garage to repair the breaks, oil, tyres and the bodywork. Then, when the vehicle is ready, Francisco can offer better service. Amongst other plans for the future, he wants to buy another truck, allowing him to gain more customers and have a higher income in order to support his youngest daughter.

loans.use: to repair his truck.

loans.name: Joy

texts.en:
Joy has a wide experience in farming. She has mastered farming activities, including growing, caring and harvesting, and is earning income as well. Joy has supported her husband doing this type of work.

Like a farmer, Joy has nurtured her membership with PMPC and has maintained a good repayment record. She knows she can always turn to the Cooperative for her financial needs.

Recently, she applied for a loan to purchase rice seeds that will have good results in healthier, heavier, and potentially higher-yielding seedlings.

Someday, Joy hopes to purchase another rice land to cultivate that will potentially add income for the family.

loans.use: to purchase rice seeds that will have good results in healthier, heavier, and potentially higher-yielding seedlings.

location.town: Sindangan-Talinga, Leon B. Postigo, Zamboanga del

loans.name: Ablavi

texts.fr: Avec deux enfants à sa charge, Ablavi est une femme mariée qui vit à Baguida pour exercer ses activités. Agée de 39 ans, Ablavi est une marchande de sacs de friperies de tous genres. Ablavi s’approvisionne de ses marchandises deux fois par mois au marché et les revendent en parcourant les quartiers environnant. Ablavi demande ce crédit pour commander des unités de sacs grands et petits modèles afin de gagner une marge bénéficiaire assez élevée pour pouvoir couvrir les charges quotidiennes dont elle éprouve et veiller à ce que les enfants soient dans de bonnes conditions de vie.
texts.en:
Ablavi is thirty-nine years old, married and has two children in her care. She lives and works in Baguida and sells second-hand bags of all types. She buys her stock twice a month from the market and sells it on foot in the surrounding neighbourhoods.

Ablavi has requested this loan to order small and large bags. She hopes to increase her earnings so she can pay for her day-to-day expenses and ensure a good standard of living for the children.

loans.use: to buy 30 large bags and 50 small bags for sale.

loans.name: Sareak

texts.en:
Sareak and her husband work as farmers in Yeav Village with four children. Beside farming, she and her husband go to do fishing to earn extra money.

Every morning, Sareak gets up early to feed pigs and also prepare equipment to go farming.

Sareak has difficulty using a car battery. It has a short life span and is easily damaged. She needs to recharge the battery every week. The car battery can't fulfill her needs to sustain her family usage and her farm.

Seeing the difficulty of using a car battery, Sareak decided to apply for a Kiva loan to buy solar home energy. She believes solar home energy can enhance her lifestyle in a more comfortable condition.

loans.use: to pay for a solar home system.

location.town: Yeav Village, Kampong Cham Commune, Sambo District

loans.name: Sandra Guadalupe

texts.es: Sandra de 44 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella posee una tienda y una tortilleria ubicada en su lugar de residencia desde hace 15 años, tiene muchos clientes y con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella esta solicitando nuevamente un credito pero en esta ocasion es para la compra de prodcutos para su tienda como:sopas, huevos, granos básicos, refrescos, golosinas, pan dulce, etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Sandra is 44 years old and lives in a house that she owns with her family. Sandra has had a shop and tortilla stall in her home for 15 years. She has many customers and, with profit from sales, is able to cover some household costs. Sandra is applying for another loan, but this time it will be used to buy more products for her shop, such as soups, eggs, basic grains, soft drinks, sweets, sweet breads and more. She can thus earn a higher income in order to enjoy a higher quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more soups, eggs, basic grains, soft drinks, sweets, sweet breads and more.

loans.name: Ana Marina

texts.es: Ana de 54 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hijo y su esposo, ella tiene un puesto de venta de comida y tambien vende refrescos su negocio esta ubicado cerca de su lugar de residencia desde hace 5 años con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar los gastos de su hogar, ella esta solicitando nuevamente un credito para la compra de frutas, azucar, hielo, gaseosa, etc. para la elaboracion de los refrescos y asi poder tener mejores ingresos economicos.
texts.en: Ana is 54 years old and lives in a house that she owns with her son and husband. She has a stall where she sells meals and soft drinks. Her business has been located near to her home for five years. With profits from sales, Ana is able to cover household costs. She is applying for another loan in order to buy fruits, sugar, ice, fizzy drinks and more to make soft drinks and earn a higher income.

loans.use: to buy fruits, sugar, ice, fizzy drinks and more.

loans.name: Eudel

texts.en:
Eudel is 32 years old and separated with two school-age children from Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. He owns and operates a parcel of agricultural land that he inherited from his parents. Through this farming activity, Eudel sufficiently provides for the needs of his family.

He is also a member in good standing of Paglaum MPC with no records of default payments. Recently, he took a loan of PHP 50,000 to pay for labor costs for land preparation and purchase bags of fertilizers.

loans.use: to pay for labor costs for land preparation and purchase bags of fertilizers.

loans.name: Rufina

texts.en: Rufina has 5 children of adult age that she raised through her snack vending business. She is a member of Paglaum MPC and has no records of default payments. Recently, she requested a loan to purchase ingredients like bags of flour, sugar, milk, butter, and other necessary items.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients like bags of flour, sugar, milk, and butter

loans.name: Diosdado

texts.en:
Diosdado is running a business and supervising the renovation of his family's home. He has requested a loan of 35,000 PHP, and hopes that soon he will live comfortably in a house that has a good roof.  

He hopes to maintain his membership in good standing with a good repayment record. Diosdado has been given priority as a Microfinance member of PMPC. 

He is thankful that all his financing needs for his retailing business and now his home are supported by PMPC.

loans.use: to purchase housing materials for house renovation

loans.name: Jeronimo

texts.es:
Jerónimo es un hombre de setenta y siete años de edad, muy honesto y trabajador, a él le apasiona el comercio, tiene desde hace mucho tiempo un negocio de pulpería, gracias al apoyo de su esposa y a las oportunidades que le ha brindado MiCrédito y Kiva, ha logrado hacer crecer su negocio y obtener ganancias que va invirtiendo en su hogar.
El confía en ambas organizaciones, sabe que la mejor forma de crecer como comerciante es al lado de Kiva junto a MiCrédito, por eso ha solicitado un préstamo que le permita invertir y comprar aceite, azúcar, arroz, frijoles, huevos y leche que son los productos que más demandan sus clientes. En un futuro planea hacer de pulpería una distribuidora.
texts.en:
Jéronimo is 77 years old and very honest and hard-working. He is very passionate about business and for a long time has had a grocery shop. Thanks to his wife´s support, and opportunities from MiCrédito and Kiva, he has been able to expand his business and earn profits to invest in his household.

Jéronimo trusts both organisations and knows that the best way to grow as a trader is with Kiva and MiCrédito. He is therefore applying for a loan that will allow him to invest and buy oil, sugar, rice, beans, eggs, and milk, the most popular products among customers. In the future, Jéronimo plans to turn his grocery shop into a distribution centre.

loans.use: to buy oil, sugar, rice, beans, eggs, and milk.

loans.name: Terry

texts.en:
Terry is 42 years old and married.

Terry works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Terry has borrowed and paid 27 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 20 years and also earns an income from farming rice.

Terry aspires to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Afi

texts.fr: Mariée et âgée de 43 ans, Afi  est une femme qui a sept enfants à charge. Habitant à Baguida, Afi prépare et vend de la pâte bandée appelée « Akpan » à la devanture de son domicile en vue d’avoir une bonne rentabilité financière. Afi s’approvisionne au marché. Pour commander du maïs, des paniers de poissons frais et de l’huile,  Afi demande ce prêt pour réaliser son achat afin de gagner plus de revenus pour faire face aux besoins de ses enfants dès la rentrée prochaine.
texts.en:
Afi is forty-three years old, married and has seven children in her care. She lives in Baguida and sells 'Akpan' (a traditional dish) from in front of her house. She buys her supplies from the market.

Afi has requested this loan to buy maize, baskets of fresh fish and oil. She hopes her earnings will increase and enable her to provide for the children at the start of the coming school year.

loans.use: to buy 1 sack of maize, 20 baskets of fresh fish and 1 drum of oil.

loans.name: Gabriela

texts.en:
Gabriela is 44 years old and married with five children. With two children in school, Gabriela works very hard to provide for them.

Gabriela runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like cannned goods, beverages, snack foods, home care products, and other groceries.

Gabriela has been in this business for six years and sells a variety of items such as rice, sugar, soap, and other groceries.

In the future, Gabriela would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like cannned goods, beverages, snack foods, home care products, and other groceries.

loans.name: Céline

texts.fr: Mariée et âgée de 43 ans, Céline est une femme qui vit à Baguida avec deux enfants à charge. Céline est une marchande des produits jardiniers qui achète ses marchandises deux fois par mois dans les jardins environnant et les revendent au marché. Céline sollicite ce crédit pour commander des tas de carottes, des oignons et des légumes afin de réaliser un bon revenu pour aider ses enfants dans leur éducation.
texts.en:
Céline is forty-three years old, married and has two children in her care. She lives in Baguida and sells vegetables. She buys her supplies twice a month from local gardens and sells her produce at the market.

Céline has requested this loan to buy bunches of carrots, onions and vegetables to increase her earnings. These will be used to provide her children with an education.

loans.use: to buy 2 bunches of carrots, 2 bunches of vegetables and 2 bunches of onions.

loans.name: Chem

texts.en:
