texts.es: Mayra de 31 años de edad vive en casa propia con su madre, ella se dedica al cultivo de cafe desde hace 5 años, vende sus prodcutos en los pueblos aledaños y ya tiene clientes establecidos por los buenos precios, con lo que obtine de sus ganancias logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella esta solicitando un credito para la compra de fertilizantes, foliares entre otros insumos para poder tener una buena cosecha y asi mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Mayra is 31 years old and lives in her own home with her mother. She has made a living growing coffee for five years. She sells her products in the neighboring villages and already has established customers because of her good prices. With her income, she manages to cover some of the household expenses.

She is requesting a loan to purchase fertilizers and foliar sprays, as well as other products, in order to have a good harvest and thus better income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and foliar sprays, as well as other products.

loans.name: Dúo Margarita De San Pedro De Aura Group

texts.es: Dúo Margarita de San Pedro de Aura La encargada de este grupo es la señora Margarita quien se dedica a la venta de verduras en general y hierbas, tiene tres hijos, es casada y cuenta con el apoyo incondicional de su esposo. Desde hace 15 años es vendedora ambulante en su aldea y su sueño es tener un puesto para no caminar tanto. No sabe leer ni escribir pero les desea lo mejor a sus hijos dándoles estudio. También tiene ventas de temporada y se aproxima la feria de su aldea y necesita artículos de feria, el dinero que tiene no le alcanza por eso necesita otro préstamo para poder comprar lo que le hace falta como juguetes, playeritas, chinchines y otros. Les agradece por la oportunidad que le dan a pesar de la distancia.
texts.en:
The leader of this group is Margarita. She makes a living selling vegetables and herbs. She has three children, is married, and has the unconditional support of her husband. For the last 15 years, she has been a traveling saleswoman in her neighborhood. Her dream is to have a stand so that she does not have to walk so much. She does not know how to read or write, but she wants the best for her children, giving them the opportunity to study.

She also does seasonal sales, and with her village fair coming up, she needs fair items. She does not have enough money for this, and therefore needs another loan to be able to buy what she does not yet have. This includes items such as toys, t-shirts, cymbals, and more. She is grateful for the opportunity that is being given to her despite the distance.

loans.use: to buy fair merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Esperanza  Idalia

texts.es: Esperanza de 48 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella se dedica a la venta de comida desde hace 24 años su negocio esta ubicado en su lugar de residenica y tiene muchos clientes, gracias a su trabajo es como puede salir adelante con su esposo, ella esta solicitando un credito para la compra de pollos, carnes, maiz, verduras, frutas, etc. todo por mayor para poder seguir con su trabajo y asi tener mejores ingresos economicos.
texts.en:
Esperanza is 48 years old and lives in her own house with her husband. She has made a living selling food for 24 years. Her business is located in her home, and she has many customers. Thanks to her job, she is able to get ahead in life with her husband.

She is requesting a loan in order to buy wholesale chicken, meat, corn, vegetables, fruit, etc. so that she can continue her work and have a better income.

loans.use: to buy wholesale chicken, meat, corn, vegetables, fruit, etc.

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en:
Margaret is 32 years old. She is married and has 3 children. 

Her business is operating a quarry. She has been in this business for 5 years. 

She earns a monthly income of twenty Kenya shillings. This is her 4th loan with VisionFund Kenya. She will use the loan to buy digging and curving material for quarry work. 

She will use the profits from expanded business to take care of family welfare as well as buy more material for the quarry. 

Her hopes and dreams are to progress and be an example and challenge to her wider family members.

loans.use: to buy digging and curving material for quarry work

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en:
Fatuma is a married woman and has been blessed with six kids all of whom attend school. She lives at her own house that neither has electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is school fees. 
Fatuma has  operated a poultry selling business, which has been operational for over one year. She mentioned disease outbreak causing losses as a challenge in the business.Fatuma dreams of becoming a wholesaler of poultry in the future
With the Kshs 15,000 she wants to purchase chicks and poultry feeds. She joined Yehu to access loans to boost her business

loans.use: to purchase chicks and poultry feeds

loans.name: Giorgi

texts.en:
Giorgi is 22 years old. He lives in Gurjaani with his wife. Giorgi is very hardworking man and works physically to generate income. He has no stable income to cover everyday expenses and decided to start a new business. The Start Up program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo enables him to get a loan.

With the received credit Giorgi will purchase three-wheeled motorcycle and will transport wood to sell. He will generate income and will be able to improve the living conditions of his family. Giorgi hopes that the business will be profitable and awaits your support.

loans.use: to purchase a three-wheeled motorcycle and transport wood.

loans.name: Nazier

texts.en: Nazier thanks all the Kiva lenders for doing a great job. He is very glad, because he uses the profits of his rice cultivation to sent his children to college where they shall have a good future. Nazier wants to continue with planting of rice so he can save more for his family. For this, he needs a loan of SRD 7.000 to purchase inputs for his rice production.

loans.use: to purchase diesel and fertilizer for his rice cultivation.

loans.name: Prossy

texts.en:
Prossy is a repeat borrower at Ugafode. She is single but with 5 children and a resident of Nabweru. She has applied for a loan of 1.5millions for 10 months to increase stock of her clothes selling business, however Ms Prossy is faced with challenges of low working capital that leads to loss of customers and business.

She is so hopeful that if financed she will attract more customers to her market and is so grateful with Ugafode microfinance and Kiva funds that have helped her boost her business .

loans.use: to add clothing stock.

loans.name: Eutropia

texts.en: Eutropia is a resident of Garcia Hernandez, Bohol. She is 60 years old, married with six grown children. Six months ago, Eutropia started a Sari-sari store business with a videoke machine where people can sing, drink and have fun. Her business is thriving and earns her an income of PHP4000 per month. She is asking a loan to buy a new microphone and stocks of soft drinks and beer. In the future, she hope that her business will be more sustainable and profitable. Her income will be food and reinvestment in the same business.

loans.use: to buy a new microphone, soft drinks and beer

loans.name: Dúo El Capitillo Group

texts.es: Dúo El Capitillo, está integrado por doña Marleny de 40 años de edad y tiene 4 hijas ella se dedica a la venta y elaboración de productos desinfectantes para pisos, jabones, etc. este es el segundo crédito que ella solicita ya que necesita capital para invertir en la compra de productos químicos como aromatizantes colorantes, etiquetas, Carguard 80, Nonilfenol, Formol  ya  que ella elabora sus desinfectantes y los ofrece a las tiendas a sus clientes  y los vende de forma ambulante ella esta agradecida ya que con el primer crédito que ella obtuvo logro comprar mercadería pero no lo suficiente ya que son químicos demasiado caros y no le tiene cuenta comprar por menor por eso ella nuevamente solicita su apoyo con otro crédito para obtener más ingresos y poder darles una mejor vida a sus hijas, su mayor anhelo es poder darles una mejor vida a sus hijas dándoles educación.
texts.en:
Marleny is a member of the Duo El Capitillo group. She is 40 years old and has four daughters. She makes a living through the sale and production of disinfectant products for floors, soap, etc.

This is the second loan that she has requested, since she needs capital to invest in the purchase of products such as air-fresheners, coloring, labels, and various chemicals. She makes her disinfectants and offers them to stores, her customers and also sells them in an itinerant manner. She is grateful because with her first loan she managed to buy merchandise but not enough since the chemicals are expensive. She does not have enough money to buy more.

Therefore, she is again requesting your support with another loan to obtain more income and to be able to give a better life to her daughters. Her greatest dream is to be able to give her daughters a better life by providing them with education.

loans.use: to buy materials for making disinfectants to sell.

loans.name: Sheena

texts.en:
Sheena is a married woman with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Sheena is 28 years old and one of her children is in school.

Sheena has a food vending business in the Philippines. Sheena has been in this business for eight years.

Sheena requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase ingredients for her food vending business such as rice, sugar, oil, etc.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

In the future, Sheena would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for her food vending business such as rice, sugar, oil, etc.

loans.name: Maricel

texts.en:
Maricel is 32 years old and married with three children.

She is in agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. Maricel is borrowing PHP 20000 through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pig.

Maricel has been in this business for 8 years and also earns additional income from farming rice.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to  save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Samnang

texts.en:
Living in a farming community, Samnang devotes himself to his family business in order to achieve substance family living and his only child to pursue higher education. As an farmer for almost 10 years, he wants his children to be highly educated to at least bachelor degree. However, his family is living in a remote area without power grid.

As a result, Samnang decided to apply for a Kiva loan to buy high quality solar home systems for his family safety and his future goal. His children will be able to study at night time better than before. His whole family also can live in a safe environment.

loans.use: to buy a solar home system.

location.town: Yeav Village, Kampong Cham Commune, Sambo District

loans.name: Azucena Antonia

texts.es:
Azucena, es una mujer de cuarenta y ocho años de edad, muy alegre, honesta, franca y trabajadora. Tiene más de diez años teniendo su negocio de venta de comida, la zona en la que vive posee muchos negocios y ella se ha encargado de alimentar a todos los trabajadores de estos, logrando tener clientes fieles a su sazón. Ella ya ha tenido créditos por parte de MiCrédito y Kiva, con los cuales ha logrado crecer notablemente y por los cuales está muy agradecida. 
En estos momentos ha vuelto a tocar las puertas de Kiva junto a MiCrédito para que se le otorgue un préstamo que le permita abastecerse de todos los productos que utiliza en su negocio y comprar aceite, arroz, frijoles, refrescos embotellados, entre otros. En un futuro desea hacer de su negocio un restaurante, mejorar la infraestructura de su local y superarse como comerciante.
texts.en:
Azucena is a very cheerful, honest, frank, and hardworking 48-year-old woman. For over 10 years, she has been selling food as a business. The area where she lives has many businesses and she has been responsible for feeding all the workers of these, winning loyal customers in her maturity. She already has had loans through MiCrédito and Kiva, with which she has managed to grow significantly and for which she is very grateful.

Right now, she has returned to knock on the doors of Kiva together with MiCrédito to be granted a loan that will allow her to stock up on all the products that she uses in her business and to purchase oil, rice, beans, and bottled drinks, among others. In the future, she wishes to make her business a restaurant, to improve the infrastructure of her premises, and to excel as a trader.

loans.use: to purchase oil, rice, beans, and bottled drinks, among others.

loans.name: Sona's Group

texts.fr:
Le banc villageois a été créé 06 Décembre 2010 lors l’inauguration du dit banc villageois. Ce groupement vient d’entamer son dixième cycle et  compte des femmes qui habitent toutes le même village. Elles jouissent d’une bonne entente et d’un bon esprit de groupe. Elles ont comme activité principale le petit commerce.

Madame Sona (debout à l’extrême droite avec une main levée)est l’emprunteuse vedette du  groupe. Elle est âgée 39 ans, mariée et mère de 05 garçons et  vendeuse de légumes.

Avec ce nouveau crédit elle compte acheter 01 sceau de patte d’arachide à 10000f des légumes et du poisson fumés d’un montant de 30000f pour le revendre en détails et le renouvelé à la fin de son stock.

Avec les bénéfices, elle compte finaliser sa construction, acheter un frigo et s’occuper de l’habillement, la nourriture les soins médicaux et la scolarité de ses enfants.
texts.en:
The village association was created on December 6, 2010 when this village association was inaugurated. This group is starting its 10th cycle of loans and the members are women who all live in the same village. They get along together well and have a good group spirit. Their principal activity is small-scale retailing.

Madame Sona (standing at the far right with one hand raised) is the featured borrower of this group. She is 39, married, the mother of five sons and she sells vegetables.

With this new loan, she intends to buy one bucket of peanut butter for 10,000 francs, some vegetables and smoked fish for 30,000 francs to retail, to be renewed when her stock is expended.

With the profits, she intends to finish up her construction, buy a refrigerator, and pay for the clothing, food, health care, and school expenses of her children.

loans.use: to buy one bucket of peanut butter for 10,000 francs, and vegetables and smoked fish for a total of 30,000 francs; to be sold retail and restocked when her inventory is expended.

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina, 38, is married and has five children, four of whom are in school. For the past ten years she has farmed seaweed in the Philippines to earn a living.

Gina has taken out and successfully repaid three prior loans through Kiva's field partner NWTF to sustain her business. She has now applied for a 13,000 PHP loan to buy plastic and other supplies to use in it.

Gina is working to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy plastic and other supplies to use in her seaweed business.

loans.name: Isadora

texts.en:
Isadora is a 45-year-old married woman. For the past eight years she has worked hard earning a living by buying and selling a variety of shells in the Philippines.

Isadora has applied for a 15,000 PHP loan through Kiva's field partner NWTF to buy more shells to sell. She is saving money in an effort to build up her business.

loans.use: to buy more shells to sell.

loans.name: Inocencio

texts.en: Inocencio is 32 years old and from the municipality of Duero, Bohol. He is a hard working man who is engaged in making and selling snacks such as chicharon (pork cracklings) and other fried and crispy snacks. This business started four years ago, earning him PHP5000 per month. He is asking for a loan to buy flour, plastic cellophane and seasoning. The income that he will generate will provide for food and reinvestment in the same business. In the future, he hopes to buy a motorcycle so he can use it to deliver his products.

loans.use: to buy flour, plastic cellophane and seasoning

loans.name: Leonita

texts.en: Leonita is a hardworking mother from Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is 48 years old and a businesswoman who makes copra. She buys whole coconuts for this. Leonita has signed her membership with the cooperative to gain access to insurances and credit. She applied for a loan to buy whole coconuts for making copra. Leonita hopes to succeed in this business to continuously provide for her family.

loans.use: to buy whole coconuts to make copra (dried coconut meat used for oil production)

loans.name: Lorna

texts.en:
Lorna is 62 years old from Dimiao, Bohol. Her two children are both adults. Lorna owns a Sari-sari store where she sell various goods in her community. She sell soy sauce, vinegar, feed, canned food, soft drinks, liquors, bath soap, shampoo and detergent. This business has existed for fifteen years now.

She is asking a loan to buy more items to sell like soft drinks, liquor, shampoo, seasoning, canned food and condiments. Her income will be for reinvestment in the same business, healthy meals and savings.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, liquor, shampoo, seasoning, canned food and condiments.

loans.name: Maritza De Jesus

texts.es: Doña Maritza de 50 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida y su hija, ella posee una sala de belleza ubicada cerca de su lugar de residencia desde hace 9 años, con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar los gastos de su hogar, ella solicita un crédito para poder comprar productos para su salón de belleza como: cremas, shampoo, ganchos para el cabello, tijeras, entre otras cosas que necesita y así podrá obtener mejores ganancias que le ayudaran a tener una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en: Maritza is 50 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and daughter. She has owned a beauty salon located near her home for 9 years. With the earning she receives she is able to support her household. She seeks a loan in order to buy products for her beauty salon such as: to creams, shampoo, hair clips, scissors, and other items that she needs and in this way be able to have greater income which will help them have a greater economic stability.

loans.use: to buy creams, shampoo, hair clips, scissors, and other items.

loans.name: Kim Oun

texts.en:
Kim Oun works as a farmer over 20 years living in Yeav village with wife and 2 children, Kim Oun has positive view for his future business. he wants to expand business start from small land to bigger and bigger land. With the help of wife and support from children, he never loses hope and is hard work willing. He wants to get up early morning and go late to spend more time on work; however, it is a challenge for him because his house doesn’t have enough energy to generate light.

He has to get up when the sun raises high enough to see thing clearly and go home early before the road is too dark. As a result, he decided to apply to Kiva to buy a solar home system. He believes he will have enough energy for his family usage and also improve his working hours.

loans.use: to pay for a solar home electricity system.

location.town: Yeav Village, Kampong Cham Commune, Sambo District

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.en:
Cecilia is thankful for the capital Kiva's field partner PMPC extends to small-time borrowers like herself. She signed up for membership so as to avail herself of the capital she needed to open her sari-sari, or small general store in the Philippines. She was able to turn the tide in her favor and has been making good money these days.

Cecilia has applied for another loan, this time for 15,000 PHP, to restock her sari-sari with basic commodities such as canned goods, cooking oil and soy sauce. With her good fortune at hand she hopes to improve her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to restock her sari-sari with basic commodities such as canned goods, cooking oil and soy sauce.

loans.name: Aivy Rose

texts.en: Aivy Rose is a 23-year-old woman from San Dionisio, Iloilo. She is a mother of eight months old daughter. Her partner works hard as company driver. During free time her partner drives their own motorcycle to have extra income. Aside from that, Aivy Rose is running a sari-sari store business. She has been doing this for a year. She is asking a loan to buy gasoline and family needs such as food and medicines. She also buys grocery items such as laundry soap, toiletries, spices, biscuits, candies, chips, coffee, sugar, powdered chocolate drink and powdered juice. In the future, she dreams to be a successful business woman.

loans.use: to buy gasoline, food, medicines, laundry soap, toiletries, spices, biscuits, candies, chips, coffee, sugar, powdered chocolate drink and powdered juice

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tires and perform maintenance on his truck.

loans.name: Las Afortunadas Del Rosal Group

texts.es:
Las Afortunadas del Rosal lleva por nombre un grupo ubicado en una comunidad del Estado de México la cual conserva lengua y tradiciones de la antigua cultura mazahua. Los miembros conservan el nombre desde hace mucho tiempo pues gracias a su responsabilidad han sido beneficiarios del préstamo. 
   Ma. Susana es una persona muy amable, siempre está de muy buen humor y sus ganas de salir adelante la identifican entre sus conocidos. Vive casada con Javier con quien desde hace 30 años formó una familia con 8 hijos los cuales ninguno depende de la pareja. Doña Susi, como le dicen de cariño, se ha dedicado a la elaboración de pan, la actividad fue motivada por su esposo ya que desde pequeño sus padres le inculcaron el arte de realizar pan tradicional. Los puntos de venta son muy variados pero mayormente son fiestas municipales y mercados, de igual modo vende de casa en casa para obtener mejores ingresos. Actualmente seis de sus hijos realizan la misma actividad y cada uno de ellos tiene su propio negocio; la competencia es sana y está contenta de que todos se puedan beneficiar de tan deliciosa labor. 
   Ahora con la oportunidad del préstamo podrá comprar harina, manteca, levadura, huevo, etc., esto le ayudará a producir en mayor escala. Su meta es poder comprar un vehículo más para trasladar con mejor eficacia su producto entre los tres puestos que maneja. Con las ganancias obtenidas de las ventas compró tubos para construir nuevos puestos en donde ofrecer su mercancía. Susi además comentó alegremente que “gracias a los préstamos ahora tenemos hornos de gas los que nos permiten vender pan calientito además de pizzas”.
   Las otras integrantes del grupo son Patricia quien invertirá en una farmacia mientras que Graciela y Norma Isela invertirán en la elaboración de pan.
*La fotografía fue tomada en las escaleras del quiosco municipal, Doña Susi es quien viste el suéter rojo y el chaleco negro.
texts.en:
"Las Afortunadas del Rosal" ["The Fortunate of Rosal"] is the name of a group located in a community in the State of Mexico that preserves the language and traditions of the ancient Mazahua culture. The members have kept this name for a long time because they are grateful for the responsibility of being the beneficiaries of the loan.

Ma Susana is a very friendly person. She is always in a good mood and her desire to move forward identifies her among those who know her. She is married and lives with Javier, with whom she formed a family 30 years ago. They have 8 children, none of whom depend on the couple.

Doña Susi, as people call her with affection, has earned a living through baking bread. The activity that was encouraged by her husband because since she was little her parents included her in the art of making traditional bread. The points of sale are quite varied, but are primarily municipal parties and markets. Likewise, she sells them from house to house to earn a better income. Currently, 6 of her children carry out the same activity and each one of them has their own business. The competition is healthy, and she is content that all are able to benefit from such delicious work.

Now with the opportunity of the loan, she will be able to buy flour, butter, yeast, eggs, etc. This will help her to produce at a greater scale. Her goal is to be able to buy another vehicle to move her product with greater efficiency between the three stands she manages. With the profits gained from her sales, she bought tubes to construct new stands where she offers her merchandise. In addition, Susi commented happily that "Thanks to the loans we now have gas stoves that allow us to sell hot bread as well as pizzas."

The other group members are Patricia, who will invest in a pharmacy, while Graciela and Norma Isela will invest in baking bread.

*The photograph was taken in the stairs of the municipal pavilion. Doña Susi is the one who is wearing the red sweater and the black vest.

loans.use: to purchase flour, yeast, sugar, eggs, etc.

loans.name: Jose Eulises

texts.es: José de 38 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus tres hijos, el se dedica al cultivo de güisquil desde hace 15 años, experiencia que le ha dado la oportunidad de tener una buena cosecha y así poder vender un buen producto para una mejor ganancia y solventar los gastos del hogar, el está solicitando nuevamente un credito para la compra de abono, fertilizantes y controles de plagas y así poder seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos.
texts.en:
José is 38 years old, and lives in his own home with his wife and their three children. He has made a living growing chayote squash for 15 years. This experience has given him the opportunity to get a better harvest and thus be able to sell a good product for better profit and to cover the household expenses.

He is requesting another loan in order to buy organic compost, fertilizer, and pest control and thus be able to continue his job since this is his only source of income.

loans.use: to buy organic compost, fertilizer, and pest control.

loans.name: Miriam Del Socorro

texts.es:
Miriam es una joven mujer de treinta y un años de edad, muy inteligente y trabajadora, luego de salir de la escuela secundaria ella emprendió un negocio de pulpería, inicio a trabajar con unos ahorros que tenía con su madre. Luego al casarse, su esposo le ayudo a que su negocio creciera, gracias a su vocación para la administración, ella ha superado distintos obstáculos y mantenido a flote su pulpería.
Ha golpeado las puertas de Kiva junto a MiCrédito, para que se le otorgue un préstamo que le abra la oportunidad de ofertar en su negocio nueva mercaderia y comprar bisutería, perfume, ropa, entre otras cosas que la gente busca para ocasiones especiales. Una de sus metas próximas es tener una máquina para hacer palomitas y algodón de azúcar, dado que hay muchos niños que juegan en el sector.
texts.en:
Miriam is a young 31-year-old woman. She is very intelligent and hard-working. After finishing secondary school, she started a small grocery store business. She began to work with some savings that her mother had. After she got married, her husband helped her business to grow. Thanks to her vocation in management, she has overcome various obstacles and has kept her grocery store afloat.

She has knocked on the doors of Kiva, along with MiCrédito, to be granted a loan. This will open the opportunity to offer new merchandise in her business, by buying jewelry, perfume, and clothing, among other things that people seek for special occasions. 

One of her next goals is to have popcorn and cotton candy machines, because there are many children that play in the area.

loans.use: to buy jewelry, perfume, and clothing, among other things.

loans.name: Manuela

texts.es:
Manuela es una mujer de 32 años de edad, es soltera vive junto a sus padres y hermanos en una comunidad de la aldea Santa Catarina Ixtahuacán.
Manuela con el afán de obtener a sus ingresos y sacar adelante a su familia desde hace 3 años se dedica al tejido típico, a Manuela le gusta esta actividad porque lo realiza desde la comunidad de su hogar y le permite hacer otras actividades como dedicarse a la venta y cultivo de banano.
Manuela es una mujer ya madura que ha considerado necesario adquirir un terreno donde pueda cultivar y mejorar sus ingresos, aunque una de sus dificultades es no tener el dinero necesario para poder realizar la compra de su terreno, por tal motivo solicita un préstamo.
Su mayor sueño es que su negocio de banano crezca para cuando forme su familia tenga mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en: Manuela is a 32 year old woman. She is single and lives with her parents and siblings in a community of the village of Santa Catarina Ixtahuacán. In order to earn her income and support her family, for three years she has worked making traditional embroidery. Manuela likes this activity because she makes it in her home and it allows her to work in other activities such as selling and cultivating bananas. Manuela is a mature woman already who thinks it is necessary to purchase a plot of land where she can cultivate and improve her income; although one of her problems is not having the needed money to buy the land. For this reason she is requesting a loan. Her biggest dream is to have her banana business grow, so that she can have better life conditions when she forms a family.

loans.use: to buy a plot of land.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.en: Rosa is a hardworking mother who finds pleasure in venturing into various business activities to provide for her growing family especially as most of her children enter college. She vends sea shells, fruits, vegetables and farms. Through her hard work, she was able to acquire a parcel of rice land that augments her income. Like a nurturing mother, she also nurtures her membership with the cooperative by paying her obligations without records of default. Recently, she requested a loan to pay for land preparation like plowing & harrowing and to purchase of good variety of seedlings for healthier, bigger and a larger quantity of produce.

loans.use: to pay for land preparation like plowing & harrowing and to purchase a good variety of seedlings for healthier, bigger and a larger quantity of produce.

loans.name: Ismael Antonio

texts.es: Ismael de 32 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, desde hace 15 años se dedica al cultivo de de maíz y maicillo,  comercializa en los alrededores de la zona donde el reside y con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el está solicitando nuevamente un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Ismael is 32 years old and lives in his own home with family. For 15 years he has been growing corn that he sells in the surrounding area near his home and with the income he is able to support some of his household expenses. He seeks a new loan to buy seeds, fertilizers, manure, pesticide, etc. in order to improve the land that is shown in the photograph in order to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, manure, pesticide, etc. in order to improve the land.

loans.name: Gerber Valdomiro

texts.es: Gerber de 40 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida, el posee un taller de mecánica automotriz ubicado en su lugar de residencia desde hace 25 años, tiene muchos clientes por su buen trabajo, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Gerber está solicitando un crédito para la compra de lubricantes para vehiculos ya si poder para seguir con su trabajo para tener mejores ganancias.
texts.en: Gerber is 40 years old. He lives in his own house with his life partner. For 25 years, he has owned a car repair shop located in his place of residence. With what he earns from his job, he is able to pay for some household expenses. Gerber is requesting a loan to buy lubricants for vehicles and to be able to continue with his job in order to have better earnings.

loans.use: to buy lubricants for vehicles.

loans.name: Merilyn

texts.en:
Merilyn is 42 years old. She is known in the Rizal, Lopez Jaena, Misamis Occidental area for her sari-sari (variety) store. She actively participates in the various programs and services that the co-op offers. She hopes to live comfortably, in a decent house. She applied for a loan to purchase plywood, nails, and sticks.

Merilyn hopes to maintain her co-op membership in good standing, with a good repayment record. It matters that she has been given priority as a microfinance member of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC). This is what she is thankful for, when all her financing needs of her retailing business are supported by PMPC.

loans.use: to purchase plywood, nails, and sticks for her house.

loans.name: Maria Lita

texts.en:
Maria Lita is a married woman with 11 children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. She is 45 years old, and five of her children are in school.

Maria Lita has a fishing business in the Philippines. She requested a 20,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy fish nets, gasoline and other fishing supplies.

Maria Lita has been in this business for five years. In the future, she would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy fish nets, gasoline and other fishing supplies

loans.name: Rommel Daniel

texts.es:
Rommel es un hombre de treinta y siete años de edad, de carácter fuerte y trabajador, el tiene un negocio en el cual vende todo tipo de calzado para hombres y mujeres, con el apoyo de su esposa y de sus dos hijos, siempre brindan una buena atención a todos sus clientes.
Está muy agradecido y confía tanto en ambas organizaciones, que ha vuelto a solicitar un préstamo, que planea utilizar para la compra de nuevos estilos de calzado, que estén a la vanguardia y satisfagan la demanda de su clientela. En un futuro desea abrir otra tienda, además de experimentar la venta de otros productos como ropa y calcetines.
texts.en: Rommel is a 37 year old man with a strong character and is hard-working. He has a business selling all kinds of shoes for men and women. With the support of his wife and of his two children, they provide excellent attention to their customers. He is very thankful and trusts in both organizations, that he has returned to seek a loan that he plans to use to buy new styles of shoes that are in style and thus meet the demands of his customers. In the future he wishes to open another store, in addition to selling other items such as clothing and socks.

loans.use: to buy new styles of shoes.

loans.name: Jacqueline

texts.en:
Jacqueline is a married woman with five children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Jacqueline is 35 years old and has four children who are in school.

Jacqueline has a fishing business in the Philippines. Jacqueline requested a PHP 6,000 loan through NWTF to buy fishing nets and other fishing supplies .

Jacqueline has been in this business for 14 years. In the future, Jacqueline would like to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets and other fishing supplies

loans.name: Ana  Julia

texts.es: Ana de 42 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus tres hijas, ella se dedica al cultivo de maiz, frijol y loroco desde hace 17 años, comercializa sus productos en los alrededores de la zona donde el reside, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella esta solicitando un credito para la compra de abonos, fertilizantes, controles de plagas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra la fotografia para continuar con sus siembras y asi tenr mejores ingresos economicos.
texts.en: Ana is 42 years old. She lives in her own house with her three daughters. She has worked cultivating corn, beans and loroco (vine with edible flowers) for 17 years. She sells her products in the outskirts of the area where she lives. With what she obtains from her sales, she is able to pay for some household expenses. She is requesting a loan to buy manure, fertilizers, plague controls, etc., and to improve the soil shown on the photograph in order to continue with her crops, and in this way to have better financial income.

loans.use: to buy manure, fertilizers, plague controls, etc., and to improve the soil.

loans.name: Glory

texts.en: Glory is a businesswoman who earns income through retailing various items and from her monthly pension. She is a full-fledged member of PMPC and enjoys the benefits of insurance and financial assistance. Recently, she applied for a loan to purchase bags of cement and hollow blocks. She is on her way to renovating her house. She wishes to live comfortably with her family.

loans.use: to purchase bags of cement and hollow blocks

loans.name: Freddy Anastacio

texts.es:
Fredy es un joven de veinte y nueve años de edad, que le apasiona la mecánica, el hace un par de años decidió emprender un taller de reparación de carros, con el apoyo de su familia. Poco a poco ha logrado adquirir herramientas que han diversificado los servicios automotrices que brinda. 
Él sabe que el mundo de la mecánica está en constante actualización, por eso ha recurrido a Kiva junto a MiCrédito, para que se le otorgue un préstamo que le permita comprar un soplete compresor para los motores de los carros. En un futuro desea mejorar la infraestructura de su local, además de poner una pequeña tienda de refrescos y bocadillos, para hacer la espera de sus clientes más placentera.
texts.en:
Fredy is a 29 year old young man who is passionate about his work as a mechanic. A couple years ago he decided to open a car repair shop with the support of his family. Little by little he has been able to acquire tools that have diversified the automotive services he provides. He knows that the mechanic's world is in constant updating. Therefore he approached Kiva and MiCredito for a loan that will permit him to buy a blowtorch compressor for car motors.

In the future he wishes to improve the infrastructure of his locale, in addition, open a small store selling refreshments and snacks in order to make the wait for his customers more pleasurable.

loans.use: to buy a blowtorch compressor for car motors.

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria is a 46-year-old woman who earns a living through farming. She is married with school-age kids and lives in Bato, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental. Maria was stricken with a great need of money so she decided to pawn a parcel of coco land that she acquired in an earlier stage of her marriage.

Maria is a MIGS member of Paglaum MPC, and she had availed herself of loans without a record of delayed payments. With the desire to get back what she has lost, she asks for a loan to redeem her pawned parcel of land.

loans.use: to redeem a pawned parcel of land.

loans.name: Aurea

texts.en:
Aurea has wide experience in farming. She has mastered farming activities from growing, caring and harvesting and earning income as well. Aurea has supported her husband doing this type of work.

Like a farmer, Aurea has nurtured her membership with PMPC and has maintained a good repayment record. She knows she can always turn to the cooperative for her financial needs. Recently, she applied for a loan to purchase rice seeds, which will have good results in healthier, heavier, and potentially higher-yielding seedlings.

Someday, Aurea hopes to purchase more rice land to cultivate, which will potentially add income for the family.

loans.use: to purchase rice seeds, which will result in healthier, potentially higher-yielding seedlings.

loans.name: Charlita

texts.en:
Charlita is 57 years old and is a businesswoman from Bato, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental. She runs a little sari-sari (variety) store and earns a meager income that sufficiently supports her family. Charlita has expertise in selling. She is a full fledged member of PMPC and has already taken several loans. Charlita maintains her membership in good standing without default. 

Charlita is requesting a loan to restock store with basic commodities and consumable items. She continues to look for better business opportunities, proof that she has the passion and the energy to make ends meet for her family.

loans.use: to restock her store with basic commodities and consumable items

loans.name: Apolonia

texts.en:
Apolonia manages a restaurant in Looc Proper, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental. She mastered her business when she and her husband were in the early years of their marriage. Apolonia’s restaurant has been doing well and supporting the needs of her family. Her customers are locals and students. 

Apolonia is requesting a loan to purchase more kilos of meat and spices for her restaurant business. In the future, she wants to expand her business and she would be more than happy to open a small canteen at a nearby school.

loans.use: to purchase meat and spices for her restaurant business

loans.name: Analiza

texts.en:
Analiza is 46 years old and married with three children. One of her children is in school and she works very hard to provide for them. For the past nine years, Analiza has run a general store in the Philippines where she sells a variety of items.

Analiza is requesting an 8,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy items to sell such as canned goods, eggs, junk foods, home care products, and other groceries. In the future, she would like to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, eggs, junk foods, home care products and other groceries

loans.name: Torcuata

texts.en: Torcuata is 64 years old, married, and lives in Rizal, Lopez Jaena, Misamis Occidental. She is driven by her passion to send her children to school until they finish college. Unable to provide the needs of her children in college through her snack vending business, she pawned a parcel of land which she inherited from her parents. Unfortunately, she learned too late that Paglaum MPC offers loan programs to college students. Therefore, she signed up for membership, and this time her loan amount is not for the studies of her children but to reacquire the inheritance from her parents. The loan of PHP 10,000 will be used to redeem the pawned parcel of land.

loans.use: to redeem a pawned parcel of land

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
Ella es una joven casada de veintiocho años, es empleada en una agencia aduanal. Desde  hace mas de diez años ha tenido que utilizar anteojos debido a que por herencia su vista es débil. Ella quiere poder ver bien sin depender de sus anteojos.
La única opción que ella tiene para corregir su miopía es mediante un procedimiento quirúrgico. Se encuentra muy entusiasmada ya que al dejar la dependencia de los anteojos tendrá una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
She is a young married woman of 28, and works for a customs agency. For 10 years she has had to use glasses, due to the fact that her vision is weak by heredity.

She wants to be able to see well, without depending on her glasses. 

The only option she has for correcting her myopia is through a surgical procedure. She is very excited, as by ending her dependence on glasses she will have a better quality of life.

loans.use: for eye treatment

loans.name: Gorgonio

texts.en: Gorgonio is 66 years old and lives in Panalsalan, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental. A farmer and a member in good standing of Paglaum MPC with no loan defaults, he has requested a loan to pay for a medical check up and maintenance medicines.

loans.use: to pay for a medical check up and maintenance medicines.

loans.name: Estrella

texts.en:
Estrella wants to prepare for this cropping season. As a member of Paglaum MPC, she avails herself of various loan products for her farming activities. She maintains her good records of payments without default. So, whenever she needs financial assistance, she can always turn to the cooperative.

This time, she is accessing a loan of PHP 6,000 to purchase bags of fertilizers. Estrella is hoping for a good harvest this cropping season.

loans.use: to purchase bags of fertilizers.

location.town: Pagadian - Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Jincy

texts.en:
In 2014, Jincy learned about Paglaum MPC and signed up for membership. She accessed loan programs that help wetland farmers like her.

She successfully repaid her loan and now is asking for a loan to finance her farming activity. The amount of PHP 7,000 will be used to purchase bags of fertilizers.

Jincy hopes for a good harvest so that she can maintain her good membership with the cooperative.

loans.use: to purchase bags of fertilizers.

location.town: Pagadian - Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Rosita

texts.en:
Rosita is a hardworking farmer who cultivates her own land as her primary business venture. She became a member of Paglaum MPC in January of 2011 to access its programs.

Rosita is requesting a loan of PHP 10,000.00 to purchase bags of fertilizers.

loans.use: to purchase bags of fertilizers

location.town: Pagadian - Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Gleceria

texts.en:
Gleceria is 53 years old and married with five children. With two children in school, Gleceria works very hard to provide for them.

Gleceria runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 9,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell such as beverages, eggs, canned goods, junk foods, home care products, and other groceries.

Gleceria has been in this business for 15 years and sells a variety of items.

In the future, Gleceria would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell such as beverages, eggs, canned goods, junk foods, home care products, and other groceries.

loans.name: Maria Priscila

texts.es:
María, 21 años de edad, estudio solo primer grado, está acompañada, su pareja es empleado y trabaja en una empresa de venta de muebles, tienen dos hijos, de los cuales uno estudia.

María, se dedica a la elaboración de tortillas, tiene tres años de dedicarse a este negocio, ella aprendió este oficio por su madre; peor además de eso también se dedica a la crianza de cerdos; ella viaja en bus urbano y trabaja en el horario de 7:00 a.m. hasta las 12:00 m.d. 

El crédito lo necesita para comprar cerdos, de esta manera ella mejorará sus ingresos y le dará una mejor alimentación a su familia.

Ella sueña con terminar de construir su casa.
texts.en:
María, age 21, only went to school through first grade. She is in a common-law marriage. Her partner is employed, and he works in a furniture sales business. They have two children, one of whom is in school.

María works making tortillas. She has been working in this business for three years. She learned this trade from her mother. But in addition to this, she also works raising pigs. She travels by city bus and works a schedule from 7 am to noon.

She needs the loan to buy pigs. In this way, she will improve her income and will be able to feed her family better.

She dreams of finishing building her house.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Cesar Danilo

texts.es: el joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 23 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica desde hace 10 años a la agricultura siembra maiz y frijol, comercializa sus productos en los alrededores de la zona donde el reside y con lo que obtiene de sus ganancias logra salir adelnte, el joven vive en casa propia con su esposa y su hija, el esta solicitando un credito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de palgas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra la fotografia y asi poder seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su unica fuente de ingresos.
texts.en: The young man, whose face is pixelated because he is 23 years old and lives in a high-risk zone, has worked in agriculture for 10 years.  He plants corn and beans, and he sells his products in the surrounding area of the zone where he lives.  With what he gains in profit, he has been able to get ahead.  The young man lives in his own house with his wife and daughter.  He is requesting a loan to buy seeds, fertilizer, compost, pest control, etc., and to improve the land, which is shown in the photo.  This way, he will be able to continue his work, since this is his only source of income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, compost, pest control, etc., and to improve the land.

loans.name: Moisés Leonardo

texts.es: Moises tiene 22 años de edad, está soltero y actualmente se encuentra estudiando la carrera profesional de psicología en la Universidad, donde ya va por el IX ciclo y se siente  muy contento ya que hace 4 años que emprendió el reto de ser profesional y lo está logrando con mucha responsabilidad y perseverancia. El préstamo lo utilizara para pagar las cuotas de la universidad y así dejar de preocuparse y dedicarse en terminar sus estudios. Como plan a futuro de Moises es laborar arduamente para obtener la experiencia suficiente y empezar a seguir una maestría en su especialidad en el extranjero. Él se siente agradecido y contento con los inversionistas de KIVA por el apoyo que le están brindando ya que gracias a ello está logrando alcanzar sus metas y sueños.
texts.en:
Moises is 22 years old, he is single and he is currently studying psychology at the University. He is in his fourth cycle and is very happy that four years ago he began the challenge to become a professional and he is achieving it with responsibility and perseverance. 

He will use the loan to pay his university tuition so that he can stop worrying and focus on finishing his studies. Moises's plan for the future is to work hard to get sufficient experience and begin a Master's program abroad in his field. He is thankful for and happy with the KIVA investors for the support they have given him. Thanks to them he is able to reach his goals and achieve his dreams.

loans.use: to pay university tuition.

loans.name: Junemar

texts.en:
Junemar has been in the motorcycle repair business for three years. He acquired his skills when he gained a vocational degree in automotive servicing. He is married with two school-aged children who serve as his inspiration.

Because he needs additional capital for his growing business, Junemar signed up for membership in Paglaum MPC in August of 2014. Having repaid his previous loan, he is now requesting a new one for PHP 50,000.00 to purchase spare parts for his repair business.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts for his motorcycle repair business.

location.town: Pagadian - Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Yeison

texts.es:
Yeison es un joven productor de café desde hace 10 años. El ya inicio el proceso de conversión de producción de café convencional a café orgánico, para fortalecer este proceso Yeison solicita un nuevo préstamo por que necesita fertilizar nuevamente el café y sembrar 200 árboles más. Con el nuevo  préstamo Yeison comprara 100 bultos de abono sólido, 20 pomas de abono  líquido, sembrara 200 árboles más de café y mejorara el beneficio seco para aumentar y optimizar la producción del café en su próxima cosecha. Con la fertilización anterior Yeison garantizo que la producción del café se mantuviera y aumentara.
El anterior préstamo le ayudo a Yeison a fortalecer su proyecto de café orgánico y así la salud de él, su familia y consumidores no está en riesgo.
texts.en:
Yeison is a young coffee grower who has been working in the field for 10 years. He has already begun the process of switching from conventional coffee production to organic coffee. In order to continue this process Yeison is applying for a new loan because he needs to fertilize the coffee again and plant 200 more trees.  

With the new loan Yeison will buy 100 packages of solid fertilizer and 20 bottles of liquid fertilizer, plant 200 more coffee trees, and improve the dry mill in order to increase and optimize the coffee production of his next harvest.  With the previous fertilization Yeison guarenteed that the production of his coffee would be maintained and increased. 

The previous loan helped Yeison to strengthen his organic coffee project and in this way improved his health, as well as the health of his family and his consumers who aren't at risk.

loans.use: to improve organic coffee production.

loans.name: Jorge  Alberto

texts.es: Jorge vive en casa propia con su esposa, el posee un taller de resparacion de celulares desde hace 12 años, tiene muchos clientes por su buen trabajo, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el esta solicitando un credito para la compra de cargadores, baterias, pantallas entre otras cosas todo por mayor y asi poder seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su unica fuente de ingresos.
texts.en:
Jorge lives in his own home with his wife. He has had a workshop for cellphone repairs for 12 years. He has many customers due to his good work. With what he gets from his sales, he manages to cover some of his household expenses.

He is requesting a loan in order to buy wholesale chargers, batteries, and screens among other items, and thus be able to continue with his job since this is his only source of income.

loans.use: to buy wholesale chargers, batteries, and screens among other items.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy flour, yeast, sugar, honey, lard, etc.

loans.name: Las Hermosas Flores Group

texts.es:
Este grupo está emprendiendo su segundo ciclo. La mayoría de los socias se conocen entre sí y son responsables. Este es el segundo crédito que Lorencia tiene con el Grupo “Hermosas Flores”. Lorencia nos comenta que gracias a su crédito anterior  mejoro la economía en su familia. Dejo las ventas de anticuchos por problemas que se presentó y no fue obstáculo para dejar el otro negocio de ventas ropas y productos de belleza. Seguir trabajando positivamente es su mayor anhelo es por eso que sigue con sus ventas de ropas y productos de belleza de catalogo de una marca conocida en el país. Solicito el préstamo para comprar ropa de catálogo para poder aumentar poco a poco su stock y así ofrecer más variedad a sus clientes. Lorencia es la primera persona que esta parada del lado izquierdo de la foto.
Agradece a los inversionistas Kiva por confiar en ella.
texts.en:
This group is starting its second cycle. The majority of the members know each other and are responsible. This is the second loan that Lorencia has with the group "Hermosas Flores" ["Beautiful Flowers"]. Lorencia tells us that thanks to her previous loan, she improved the economy in her family. She gave up selling kebabs because of problems that came up and it was not an obstacle to leave the other business of selling clothing and beauty products. Her greatest wish is to continue working positively. It is because of this she continues selling clothing and beauty products from a catalog of a brand known in her country.

She requested the loan to buy clothing from the catalog to be able to increase her stock little by little and offer more variety to her clients.

Lorencia is the first person standing on the left side of the photo.

She is thankful to the Kiva investors for trusting in her.

loans.use: to buy clothes from catalogs.

loans.name: Amadeo

texts.es: Amadeo de 46 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, el se dedica al alquiler de equipos de audio para fiestas, cumpleaños, etc. se dedica a esa actividad desde hace 16 años y tiene muchos clientes con lo que obtiene de su trabajo es como puede salir adelante con su esposa, el esta solicitando un credito para darle mantenimiento a sus equipos y asi seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su unica fuente de ingresos.
texts.en: Amadeo is 46 years old and lives in his own house with his wife. He earns a living by renting out audio equipment for parties, birthdays, etc. He has worked in that business for 16 years and he has many clients who do business with him. This is how he is able to get ahead with his wife. He is requesting a loan to give maintenance to his equipment and to continue with his work because that is his only source of income.

loans.use: to give maintenance to his equipment.

loans.name: Eliseo

texts.es: Don Eliseo de 56 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus cuatro hijos, el se dedica al cultivo de granos basicos desde hace 40 años y comercializa sus productos en los pueblos aledaños, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el esta solicitando un credito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. y asi seguir con sus cultivos para tener mejores ingresos economicos.
texts.en:
Don Eliseo is 56 years old and lives in his house with 4 children. He's been growing basic grains for 40 years and sells his products in nearby villages and with that income he's able to cover some of his house expenses.
He's requesting a loan to buy seeds, fertilizers, and pesticides to continue taking care of his crops and have a better income.

loans.use: buy seeds, fertilizers, and pesticides.

loans.name: Cristian Jesus

texts.es: Cristian tiene 24 años de edad, está soltero y estudia la carrera profesional de Derecho en la Universidad donde ya está por el IX ciclo de la carrera a pocos meses de graduarse como Abogado. Adicional a sus estudios Cristian ayuda en el negocio de la familia para poder obtener sus propios ingresos y solventar sus estudios. El préstamo lo utilizara para pagar las cuotas de la universidad ya que de esa forma se centrara mucho más en culminar sus estudios satisfactoriamente. Él tiene como anhelo asimilarse al ejército y especializarse en derecho civil y penal de acuerdo a su profesión. Cristian está muy contento con el apoyo que está recibiendo y espera que este apoyo continúe con muchos jóvenes que lo necesitan.
texts.en:
Cristian is 24 years old, single, and studies Law in the university where he is in his 9th cycle of his degree. Within a few months he will graduate as a lawyer. In addition to his studies, Cristian helps in the family business to get his own income and pay for his studies. He'll use the loan to pay for his university fees which will help him focus on his studies.
He wishes to join the military and specialize in civil and criminal law, based on his profession. Cristian is very happy with the support he's receiving and hopes that with this support will continue for many young people that need it.

loans.use: pay for his university fees

loans.name: Karla Marcela

texts.es:
Karla, de 35 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato opción salud, se acompañó cuando tenía 22 años de edad, tiene un hijo 	que estudia en la escuela de su comunidad, mientras su pareja trabaja como obrero de construcción y viven en la propiedad de sus padres. 

Karla, se dedica a los oficios domésticos, pero se involucra también en las labores agrícolas de su familia y le gusta cuidar pollos y gallinas.

Karla, necesita el préstamo para comprar una vaca, que la cuidara junto con su hijo; ella espera cuidarla un año para luego venderla y con la ganancia cubrir algunos gastos de la casa.

Su sueño es engordar la vaca y con la ganancia que obtenga cuando la venda, pueda cubrir los gastos de su hijo para que pueda continuar en la escuela.
texts.en:
Karla is 35 years old. She attended school through high school, studying health. She got married when she was 22 years old, and she has one son who attends the community school. Her husband works in construction, and they live on their parents' property.

Karla dedicates herself to the domestic chores, but she is also involved in her family's agricultural work and she enjoys caring for the chickens and hens. Karla needs the loan in order to buy a cow that she will care for with her son. She hopes to take care of it for a year in order to sell it, and then with the profit cover some of the household expenses.

Her dream is to fatten the cow, and with the profit she gets from selling it be able to cover her son's expenses so that he can continue with school.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
La señora Elizabeth, tiene 62 años de edad, es una mujer emprendedora y valiente, pertenece a una familia de comerciantes y tiene amplia experiencia en esa actividad. Jefa de hogar que con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo ha logrado sacar adelante a su familia y darles el estudio a sus 2 hijos. Vive solo con su hijo menor de 23 años estudiante universitario. Su trayectoria como clienta de Fundación Mujer se remonta al año 2002, con más de 10 solicitudes de financiamientos aprobados, demostrando siempre una excelente moral de pago. 
Inicia su negocio hace 22 años cuando su segundo hijo estaba pequeño y se le dificultó trabajar fuera de su casa, un hermano le facilitó 350 mil colones, dinero que ella después le reintegró; Desde entonces se dedica a la venta de mercadería, especialmente bolsos y perfumes de marca originales y actualmente se extendió a la línea de joyería. También elabora comidas para eventos especiales y una vez a la semana prepara panes y diferentes tipos de repostería para vender. 
Cuenta con un negocio consolidado de muchos años, cuya ventas son la que cubren todos los gastos de esta familia; básicos, estudios, salud  y otros, que ha logrado mantener durante tanto tiempo gracias a la constante reinversión y buena gestión de los recursos.
Mantiene una cartera de clientes muy grande  y en constante crecimiento, le compran sus productos vecinos, familiares, conocidos, maestros y profesores de la escuela y el colegio cercano, entre muchos otros. Vende en su misma comunidad de y otras aledañas, cuenta con el apoyo de su hijo menor quién le ayuda a distribuir la mercadería y cobrar. Doña Elizabeth continua trabajando con toda la motivación y el entusiasmo necesario, sumado a su excelente estado de salud, su mayor deseo es que su hijo menor concluya sus estudios universitarios, propiciando siempre una mejor calidad de vida para ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Mrs. Elizabeth is 62 years old. She's a courageous and entrepreneurial woman. She's part of a family of business people and has ample experience in this activity. She's the head of the household and with much work and sacrifice has been able to get ahead her family and send her 2 sons to school. She lives alone with her younger son who is 23 years old and attends university.
Her trajectory with Fundación Mujer started in 2002 and covers more than 10 approved loan cycles, always demonstrating discipline and timeliness in her payments.
She started her business 22 years ago when her second son was still young and working outside the house became difficult. A brother lent her 350,000 colones, money that she later repaid. Since then she's been selling different articles, especially handbags and brand perfumes and more recently she's also started selling jewelry. She also sells food for special events and once a week she makes bread and other confectionery items.
She has a consolidated business for many years and with this the sales she's able to cover the family expenses, including the basic one, studies, health, and others. She's been able to maintain this for such a long time thanks to constantly reinvesting and good resource management. She has many clients and is in constant growth. She sells her products to neighbors, family members, acquaintances, school teachers and professors from nearby schools and colleges. She sells in her own community and in nearby villages.
She has the support of her son who helps her distribute the merchandise and collect payment. Mrs. Elizabeth continues to work with all the motivation and enthusiasm needs and continues with good health. Her biggest wish is for her youngest son to finish his college career so that they can have a better quality of life.

loans.use: buy merchandise like handbags, brand name perfumes, and jewelry.

loans.name: Albia Maria

texts.es:
Albia vive en Santo Domingo, una ciudad caracteriza por ser muy comercial y productiva en el país. 
Habita en casa propia junto a su madre, tiene una hija pero ya es mayor de edad y está casada. Albia es una señora muy trabajadora, ha demostrado a su familia poder salir adelante sola, cumplir sus sueños e ir superándose poco a poco; anteriormente vendía ropa y productos varios por catálogo, visitaba a sus clientes de casa en casa, comenta que era muy cansado estar recorriendo. Luego se propuso estudiar belleza y terminó su carrera, siempre le ha gustado esta rama, ya hace varios años pudo empezar de a poco con su negocio, comenzó pintando uñas y así con las ganancias pudo ir comprando los activos para iniciar, actualmente cuenta con un pequeño gabinete de belleza  único en el sector, le va muy bien porque tiene clientela de su barrio; con el crédito de Kiva y Fundación Alternativa podrá comprar más activos para el negocio, comprará muebles, máquinas de cortar cabello, tintes, cremas y además adecuará mejor su local ya que tiene plasmado en fotografías su local anhelado. Con esto podrá dar una mejor atención a su clientela ya que contará con los productos necesarios para su trabajo diario, con las ganancias ella podrá seguir ahorrando y adecuando su negocio que la ha podido sacar adelante. Gracias a estos ingresos ha podido ir mejorando su domicilio donde comparte con su madre.
Agradece a la institución y al proyecto Kiva por hacer posible que los sueños de los microempresarios estén alcanzables.
texts.en:
Albia lives in Santo Domingo, a city characterized for its commercial activity and productivity. She lives in her own house with her mother. She has a daughter who is an adult and is married. Albia is a hard working woman and has shown her family how to get ahead by herself, make her dreams come true, and keep overcoming her challenges.
In the past she sold clothes and other catalog products. She visited clients house to house but she mentions that it was very tiring to be on the street. She later studied to start her own beauty salon and finished her studies. She has always liked that line of work and now she's had this business for a few years. She started painting nails and with those earnings she bought materials to start her business.
She currently has a small beauty salon which is unique in the whole area. Things are going well because she has clients from her neighborhood.
With the loan from Kiva and Fundación Alternativa she will be able to buy more materials for her business. She will buy furniture, hair cutting machines, hair dyes, creams, and will better prepare her working space of which she has ideal pictures of. With this she will be able to better serve her clients since she will have the products she needs on a daily basis. With the earnings she will continue saving and preparing her store which has helped her get ahead.
Thanks to this income she has been able to improve the home which she shares with her mother. She's grateful to the institution and the Kiva project for making the dreams of micro entrepreneurs possible.

loans.use: buy furniture, hair cutting machines, hair dyes, etc. allowing her to grow her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy raw materials for embroidery

loans.name: Betty

texts.en:
Betty is 51 years old and married. Betty works very hard to provide for them.

Betty runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell such as accessories, personal care products, home care products and groceries.

Betty has been in this business for six years and sells a variety of items.

In the future, Betty would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like such as accessories, personal care products, home care products and groceries.

loans.name: Susana Elvira

texts.es:
Susana es una productora de café certificado desde hace diez años. Ella vive con su esposo y sus tres hijos. Susana está en el proceso de conversión de café convencional a café orgánico, para fortalecer este proceso ella necesita comprar 375 bultos de abono sólido, 20 pomas de biofertilizante y comprar herramientas que le permitan mejorar sus procesos en finca, para esto ella necesita cuatro millones setecientos mil pesos (4.700.000). Susana sueña con tener una finca modelo agroecológica y producir un café de excelente calidad, a nivel familiar Susana quiere mejorar su vivienda, garantizar a sus hijos el estudio y en el futuro tener su propio laboratorio de calidad de café.

La conversión y producción de café orgánico es un proceso integral al largo plazo independiente, saludable, balanceado y amigable con el medio ambiente lo que representa un desafío para los campesinos de Colombia y Susana ha decidido no arriesgar su salud; la de su familia ni la de los consumidores, al seguir usando químicos. La Federación Campesina del Cauca está convencida que vale la pena apoyar y fortalecer estas iniciativas alternas. Un préstamo con Kiva representa un futuro sostenible para su producción, su tierra, y su familia.
texts.en:
Susana has been a certified coffee producer for 10 years. She lives with her husband and their 3 children. Susana is in the process of converting her farm from conventional to organic coffee growing techniques. To strengthen this process she needs to buy 375 bags of solid fertilizer, 20 containers of bio-fertilizer, and tools that will allow her to improve her processes in the farm. For this she needs 4,700,000 Colombian pesos.
Susana dreams with having a model ecological farm and produce excellent quality coffee. At the family level, Susana wants to improve her home, make sure her children can study, and in the future have her own coffee quality control laboratory.
The conversion to organic farming techniques is an integral long term process which is healthy, balanced, and environmentally friendly. This presents a challenge to Colombian farmers but Susana has decided to not keep risking her health, her family's nor the health of the consumers by continuing to use chemicals.
The Federación Campesina del Cauca is convinced that these alternative initiatives should be supported and strengthened. A loan from Kiva represents a sustainable future for her production, land, and family.

loans.use: strengthen her process of clean agriculture.

loans.name: Julia Elvira

texts.es: Julia una estudiante de 31 años de edad es casada con un hijo menor. Ella estudió la carrera de Enfermería por un periodo de 05 años. Julia se siente feliz al poder continuar sus estudios haciendo su pos-grado en la carrera de enfermería. Es por ello que solicitó el crédito para el pago de su pensión de estudio.  Actualmente Julia trabaja en una clínica lo que le permite cubrir una parte de sus estudios y la de su familia. El deseo de Julia es de terminar satisfactoriamente su pos-grado en enfermería y ser más competitiva y de esta manera mejorar sus ingresos. Agradece a los inversionistas Kiva por apoyar a estudiantes como ella.
texts.en:
Julia is a 31 year old student who is married and has a small child. She studied nursing for 5 years. Julia is happy to continue her studies with a graduate degree in nursing. She requests the loan to pay for her tuition fees.
Julia currently works at a clinic which helps her cover some of her study and family expenses. Julia's wish is to successfully complete her graduate degree in nursing and be more competitive so she can improve her income. She's grateful for the Kiva investors for supporting students like her.

loans.use: pay for her tuition fees.

loans.name: Viviana

texts.en:
Viviana always wants the best for her family.

With the desire to support her husband in rearing their family, she signed up for membership with Paglaum MPC and accessed its financial loan product assistance to start up a small convenience store.

Viviana successfully repaid her loan, and this time she is asking for PHP 25,000 to purchase consumable goods such as noodles, canned goods, coffee, milk, sugar and other items.

loans.use: to purchase consumable goods such as noodles, canned goods, coffee, milk, sugar and other items.

loans.name: Kadiatou's Group

texts.fr:
Inauguré  le 08 Janvier 2004, ce BV est composé de femmes qui habitent toutes la même localité et entretiennent des liens fort de solidarité et d’entre aide. Leur activité principale est le petit commerce.

Madame Kadiatou (assise à l’extrême droite avec une main levée et un foulard rouge et un boubou noir) est l’emprunteuse vedette du groupe. Elle mariée, âgée de 37 ans et mère de 07 enfants. Elle s’active dans le commerce de produits alimentaires.

Avec ce nouveau prêt, elle compte acheter 03 sacs de sucre à 25000f le sac et des légumes d’un montant de 30000f pour le revendre en détails et à la fin du stock renouveler sa marchandise.

Les bénéfices lui permettront de participer à la prise en charge de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Founded on January 8, 2004, this banc villageois is comprised of women who live in the same town. They maintain a good sense of solidarity and mutual aid. Their main business is small business.

In the photo, Madame Kadiatou is seated at all the way to the right. She has her hand raised and is wearing a black shirt and pink scarf in her hair. She is the group’s star borrower. She is married, 37 years old, and the mother of seven children. She sells groceries.

With this new loan, she will buy three bags of sugar for 25,000F each and vegetables for 30,000F. She will sell her goods for retail prices and will buy more stock when she runs out.

Her profits help her take care of her children.

loans.use: buy three bags of sugar for 25,000F and vegetables for 30,000F.

loans.name: Alejandra

texts.en:
Alejandra is married and she and her husband are farmers.  She joined Paglaum MPC for 10 years ago and was able to expand her farm by purchasing a neighboring parcel of land with a loan from PMPC. 

Alejandra requested another loan for 6,000 PHP, which she will use to purchase bags of fertilizers and bottles of insecticides. She is hopeful that she can have good harvest so she can repay her loan ahead of schedule.

loans.use: to purchase bags of fertilizers and bottles of insecticides

loans.name: Adjo

texts.fr: Adjo est une femme mariée habitant à Tokoin et qui a deux enfants à sa charge. Agée de 32 ans, Adjo est une esthéticienne de verni qui vend des produits de beauté qui circule dans les quartiers environnant. Adjo fait son approvisionnement deux fois par mois au marché et désire ce prêt pour acheter des unités d’eau de verni, des paquets de lames et des douzaines de pied de biche en vue d’en tirer un maximum de profit afin de pouvoir subvenir aux besoins de ses enfants et améliorer leur condition de vie quotidienne de sa famille.
texts.en:
Adjo is married and lives in Tokoin. She has two dependent children. She is 32 years old and is an aesthetician. She sells nail polish and beauty products on foot in the surrounding neighborhoods.

Adjo buys her supplies two times a month in the market and would like this loan to buy nail polish, packets of razor blades, and dozens of cuticle pushers. This will help her maximize her profits, meet the needs of her children, and improve their standard of living.

loans.use: buy 18 bottles of nail polish,  12 packets of blades, and 12 dozen cuticle pushers.

loans.name: Magnym

texts.fr: Agée de 46 ans, Magnym est une femme mariée et mère d’un enfant vivant ensemble à Tokoin. Pour soutenir sa famille, Magnym vend des mèches et tissages et s’approvisionne une fois par mois au marché. Magnym trouve sa rentabilité dans son activité et pour bien satisfaire aux besoins de ses clients, Magnym désire ce crédit pour commander des paquets de tissages afin d’agrandir son stock et aider ses enfants dans leur éducation scolaire et à couvrir les besoins quotidiens de la famille.
texts.en:
Magnym is 46 years old, married, and the mother of one child. She lives with her family in Tokoin.

To support her family, Magnym sells hair extensions. She buys her supplies once a month in the market. Magnym is profitable with her business.

In order to meet the needs of her clients, she would like this loan to buy packs of hair extensions. She will increase her stock to help her children with their education and meet her family's daily needs.

loans.use: buy seven packs of hair extensions.

loans.name: Reynaldo

texts.en: Reynaldo is 47 years old, married and has two children. He raises hogs to sell as an additional source of income. He also farms. Reynaldo wants to improve the growth of his hogs, but they require more sustenance. That is why he is asking for a loan of 5,000 PHP to buy feed for his hogs' sustenance. This will ensure their proper growth and nutrition.

loans.use: to buy feed for his hogs' sustenance.

loans.name: Leticia

texts.en: Leticia is 59 years old, married and has four children. She manages a store for income. She wants to improve her sales but has insufficient funds to maintain her business. She is now asking for a loan of 5,000 PHP to use in her business. She will use her loan to buy canned goods, bread, eggs, biscuits and soft drinks to sell. This will help her to increase her sales and someday become a successful vendor.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, bread, eggs, biscuits and soft drinks to sell.

loans.name: Jennifer

texts.en:
Jennifer is 29 years old and has two children. She is in the agricultural business, farming vegetables in the Philippines. She requested a 5,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies.

Jennifer has been in this business for three years now and has borrowed from NWTF one time in the past to sustain it.

In the future, Jennifer would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Merlyn

texts.en: Merlyn is 54 years old, married and lives in Tipan, Oroquieta City. She is in the rice production business, which is primarily financed by Paglaum MPC and gives her a monthly income of 12,000 PHP, which sufficiently supports her family's needs. Merlyn grabbed the opportunity to renovate her house so she asked for a loan from the cooperative. The loan shall be used to purchase materials, such as amakan (bamboo thatch), nails, wood and sticks, and to pay labor costs.

loans.use: to purchase materials, such as amakan (bamboo thatch), nails, wood and sticks, and to pay labor costs.

loans.name: Tito

texts.en: Tito is 53 years old, single and engaged in making sunlight breakers. He's doing well with this type of business and has employed his neighbors. Due to increasing demand for his product, he asks for additional capitalization from Paglaum MPC. He shall use the loan to buy materials for sunlight breaker production, such as bamboo, nylon rope and others.

loans.use: to buy materials such as bamboo and nylon rope

loans.name: Godofreda

texts.en: Godofreda is engaged in running a fruit and vegetables stall. She has been operating her business for 25 years and earns a monthly net income of 4,800 PHP. Godofreda is 69 years old, married and has 5 adult-aged children. She is from the village of Calamba, Misamis Occidental. In 2005, Godofreda joined PMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Godofreda has successfully repaid a previous loan of 15,000 PHP from PMPC. This previous loan was used for personal purposes.
