She has always wanted to study and acquire a degree, so she went back to school. She heard about ECLOF Kenya and applied for the loan, as finding new employment has been a great challenge. She hopes that after graduating, she will have a better chance for employment. She desires to empower women and youth and this is her focus in the future. With a KIVA loan she will be able to complete her studies in peace.

loans.use: to pay for tuition costs

loans.name: San Jeronimo Group

texts.es:
REVISADO
Aunque los integrantes del grupo son sólo vecinos, ellos se consideran una verdadera familia pues se apoyan entre sí cuando alguno tiene una dificultad. Todos son originarios de una comunidad abundante en vegetación y agua en donde los habitantes pueden pasar un momento agradable a la de sus familias. 
   Rodolfo o Rodo, como es mejor conocido en su comunidad, es un joven quien ha formado una familia con su esposa Maribel. La pareja tiene dos pequeños hijos los cuales estudian uno el nivel preescolar y otro la educación primaria.
   Con el objetivo de solventar los gastos de su hogar Rodo decidió dedicarse a la cría de animales. El proceso de crianza es largo pero satisfactorio pues una vez preparados los animales las ganancias suelen ser muy esplendidas. Antes no contaba con corrales en buen estado mas, con el paso del tiempo y gracias a los préstamos, ha podido construir tres mallas para instalar sus animalitos. “Desde que hace dos años que iniciamos VF México nos ha apoyado en nuestro negocio para hacerlo crecer poco a poco” comentó Rodo quien ha recibido capacitaciones adecuadas sobre cómo criar este tipo de animales, sobre todo en cuanto enfermedades.
   Actualmente cuenta con dos cerdas como pie de cría por lo que necesita un préstamo con VF México ya que piensa comprar una gran dotación de alimento pues próximamente nacerán diez lechones aproximadamente. Él está muy contento y agradecido con los beneficios obtenidos; por ahora su única meta es tener una mejor calidad de vida y seguir apoyando a sus hijos para que estudien y puedan ejercer profesionalmente.
   Los demás integrantes del grupo son Delfino quien invierte en una tienda de abarrotes y cerdos; Fortino, en becerros y Don Marco Antonio, en artículos de abarrotes.
*La fotografía fue tomada en el centro del municipio.
texts.en:
Although the group members are simply neighbours, they regard themselves as a real family because they help each other when one of them has a problem. All come from a community where vegetation and water are abundant and where the local people can spend enjoyable times with their families.

Rodolfo (or Rodo as he is better known in the community) is a young man married to Maribel. The couple have two young children, one of whom attends pre-school and the other primary school.

In order to pay for household expenses Rodo decided to raise animals. The process is a long one but satisfying. Once the animals are ready for market, the money earned is very good. At one time Rodo didn't have corrals in good condition, but as time passed and with the help of loans, he was able to build three fenced pens for the young animals. He noted that in the two years he's been with VR Mexico, his business has slowly expanded. He has received helpful training on how to raise animals especially with regard to health problems.

Currently he has two high-quality sows so he needs a loan from VF Mexico to buy a large amount of food for them. Approximately ten piglets are about to be born. Rodo is very happy and grateful for the benefits he is enjoying; for now his only goal is to have a better standard of living and continue helping his children get a good education and eventually good jobs.

The other members of the group are Delfino who runs a grocery and raises pigs; Fortino who raises calves; and Sr. Marco Antonio who sells groceries.

The photograph was taken in the centre of the municipality.

loans.use: buy food for his pregnant pigs

location.town: SAN JERONIMO DE LOS DOLORES, SAN JOSE DEL RINCON

loans.name: Imomali

texts.ru: Имомали 33 летный житель города Душанбе. Он живет вместе отцом, матерью, братом, женой и троими детьми. Детям 7, 4 и 2 года. Имомали старший сын в семье. Он заботливый и ответственный человек. Имомали зарабатывает на жизнь с помощью автомашины. Он занимается таксистом в родном городе. Имомали с утро до вечера на работе. Он много старается, чтобы прокормить семью. У Имомали есть один источник доход. Он хочет отремонтировать свою автомашину, чтобы не потерять источник дохода и сохранить деятельности. Для оплаты мастера и для приобретения автозапчасти у него нет денежных средств. И по этой причине Имомали просит кредит. Он заранее выражает свою благодарность.
texts.en:
Imomali is a 33-year old inhabitant of the city of Dushanbe. He lives with his father, mother, brother, wife and three children. His children are seven, four and two years old. Imomali is the oldest son in the family. He is a caring and responsible person. Imomali makes a living thanks to his car. He works as a taxi driver in his native city. He works from morning to evening, doing all he can to support his family. This is his only source of income. 

Imomali would like to repair his car in order to keep his source of income and maintain his business. He lacks the funds needed to pay the mechanic and buy spare parts. This is why Imomali is requesting a loan. He expresses his gratitude in advance.

loans.use: to pay for car repair and spare parts.

loans.name: Julius

texts.en: Julius is single, and he operates a spare parts shop. He is a very knowledgeable man, concerning the spare parts business. He desires to do this business on a large scale. However, some money is still lacking to meet his dream. Julius is requesting to borrow money to buy more parts to sell, so that he will be able to meet his dream.

loans.use: to buy more spare parts to sell.
